fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / flashlight
fields.Description: Fires when you remain in the dark with Kim

fields.Title: TENT ORB / stickers
fields.Description: Stickers -- just like the one from the church padlock.

fields.Title: WHIRLING / DREAM1
fields.Description: Adrift in an alcohol induced oblivion, the faculties of your mind speak to you.

fields.Title: WHIRLING / CEILING FAN
fields.Description: The ceiling fan is spinning like the blades of some rickety old airship about to fall on you. A truly horrendous neck-tie has somehow attached itself to one of the blades.

fields.Title: WHIRLING / BATHROOM MIRROR
fields.Description: A mirror hangs on the bathroom wall, above a bent and broken sink.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / KLAASJE 1
fields.Description: A striking young woman in a silver body-suit smokes in the hostel hallway. She addresses you as if you were a police officer. You may use your finger pistols for a SUGGESTION red-check. Failure gives you some forewarning about what's going on.

fields.Title: WHIRLING / KIM INTRO
fields.Description: Downstairs ltn Kim Kitsuragi - precinct 57th's finest - is waiting to solve THE HANGED MAN with you as an inter-district co-op. It would appear Precinct 41 sent you to investigate the lynching of a "Whitewater mercenary" in "Martinaise". And that you are indeed a police officer. Kim briefs you on the case and your relationship begins - likely on the wrong foot, but not necessarily.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / GARTE
fields.Description: ltn Kitsuragi suggests you talk to the manager of the Whirling-in-Rags first. Garte is a hub of knowledge on the area and the case and you will come back to him later. He is also a problem, asking you to pay for the night, to pay for "the damages". It does not reflect well on you.

fields.Title: YARD / HANGED MAN
fields.Description: A corpse hangs from the pine-tree: a middle aged man in white armour boots and tighty whities. A medium PERCEPTION white-check lets you find a bullet hole in the back of his mouth, a low LOGIC white check that he was killed before hanging. A low THOUGHT CABINET w-c sees that the bullet is antique.

fields.Title: WESTCOAST / EXECUTIONS VISCAL
fields.Description: An easy PERCEPTION check highlights a scattering of bullet holes in the wall. Pass a medium VISUAL CALCULUS and the interact appears as a ghostly mass execution perpetrated by dotted lines against a row of figures facing the wall. Either way, dialogue with the object has you and Lt Kitsuragi figure out it was an execution after the amphibious assault. You may relive it as an INLAND EMPIRE dream sequence later.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 / KLAASJE MAIN
fields.Description:
Meeting Klaasje again, on the roof
0) Intro
1) Your name and 
2) why u here? (orbs and drugs from room) 
3) Wildflower
5) did you hear me night before / last time we saw
6) Looking for Ruby

fields.Title: VILLAGE / WASHERWOMAN
fields.Description: The Washing Woman who gives you access to the alternate sleeping location -- the shack. Includes fishing village mood and Evrart quest stuff.

fields.Title: WESTCOAST / MORELL
fields.Description: Morell, the husband of Lena, is a cryptozoologist trying to find the Insulindian phasmid.

fields.Title: ICE / ACELE
fields.Description: Lead-in to the speedfreaks, out on the ice

fields.Title: ICE / AFTER CRYING KIM
fields.Description: Automatically starts after Acele's dialogue ends with her line "Crying is good. Get it out and then maybe we can talk, okay?"

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / hearing kineema
fields.Description: An infernal machine comes to a halt somewhere outside.
fields.Placement: the upstairs room, entire room, after DREAM 1 dialogue ends

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / trashed tape player
fields.Description: This reel-to-reel tape player is still on, rolling empty.
fields.Placement: On the tape player on the shelf

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / locked door
fields.Description: You must value privacy. The door has been locked from the inside.
fields.Placement: On the door. (When you have a key it turns the door into a regular door that will automatically open when you click on it. This will also hide this orb)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / piles of tape
fields.Description: Looks like someone tore out the tape while the song was playing.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / bathroom smell
fields.Description: Words fail to describe how rank it smells in here. They should have sent a poet.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / calendar
fields.Description: The calendar says it's March. The year is '51.
fields.Placement: One the calendar, out in the hallway, close to Klaasje

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / GARTE MAIN
fields.Description: This is Garte's main dialogue for the rest of the game

fields.Title: WHIRLING / KIM MAIN
fields.Description: These are the rest of Kims MAIN dialogues with you after he's in the squad.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / speaker
fields.Description: The speaker is connected to the radio. The music is seasoned with static.
fields.Placement: The uppermoast speaker (the one that faces the veriwer)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / karaoke mic
fields.Description: A big old karaoke mic just waiting for someone to sing into it.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / lyrics stand
fields.Description: This is where the lyrics would be.
fields.Placement: On the lyrics sheet next to the mic

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / dialogue karaoke inspiration
fields.Placement: In front of the stage of the downstairs whirling. (this pops up when you've clicked all three orbs on the stage) But only IN FRONT, where you can assess the stage. ON the stage there's another orb

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / stage presence
fields.Description: This feels right. You *belong* here.
fields.Placement: On the stage, behind the mic.

fields.Title: YARD / TRASH
fields.Description: You can click on the trash container. This lets you see the padlock has a Whirling-in-Rags logo on it -> go to Garte -> ask for key -> open container - > get your paperwork

fields.Title: YARD ORB / logo trivia
fields.Description: This is the logo of the Municipality of Revachol.
fields.Placement: Around the trash container R orb (this is an afterthought of clicking on the R on the trash container

fields.Title: YARD / CUNO barks
fields.Description: Cuno throws stones and sometimes responds to Cunoesse

fields.Title: YARD / CUNOESSE barks
fields.Description: Cunoesse eggs Cuno on.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / rain shivers
fields.Condition: Variable["auto.is_raining"]  and  Variable["auto.is_snowing"] == false  and  Variable["plaza.rain_viscal_done"] == false  and  Variable["whirling.kimintro_hub_reached"]  and  Variable["auto.on_whirling_balcony"] == false
fields.Description: rain shivers
fields.Placement: the whole martinaise plaza in front of whirling: the stairs to the see, the bookstore, the crater, the way to the kiosque. everything except the yard and the jam

fields.Title: YARD / FOOTPRINTS VISCAL
fields.Description: Easy perception shows prints. Then a medium VISUAL CALCULUS reveals a numbered scheme of footprints. Interaction with the scheme lets you deduce how many vigilantes there were at the hanging, when it happened etc.

fields.Title: YARD ORB / death smell
fields.Description: Smells like spoiled meat and curdled dairy. A human being decomposes.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / BROKEN WINDOW VISCAL
fields.Description: A medium Viscal sees the shards are facing outwards.

fields.Title: PLAZA / TARE DRUNK barks
fields.Description: A drunk girl who has fallen down the stairs near the waterfront. You can steal her tare bag. She mumbles something about bottles..

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / neon sign
fields.Description: The neon sign glistens in the morning light: WHIRLING-IN-RAGS.

fields.Title: PLAZA / TIRETRACKS VISCAL
fields.Description: You notice a set of a motor carriage tracks backing into the fence.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / book pate
fields.Description: This is a book about pâté.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / book offspring
fields.Description: This book is on the subject of raising your offspring properly.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / book unimportant
fields.Description: This book... you don’t really understand what it is about, nor does it seem important.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / book boring
fields.Description: A book about boiadeiro culture. It promotes freedom and *roaming upstream*.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / future book
fields.Description: A book about the future. The government reads your mind using radio technology.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / book world conquering
fields.Description: A book about conquering the world by concentrating really hard.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / book softcover
fields.Description: A soggy softcover. The sea air has ruined it.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / book erotica
fields.Description: This book has a rose, a pistol and a half naked dame on its cover.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / book wholeness
fields.Description: On the cover stands a very muscular man, surrounded by flames.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / wholeness inland
fields.Description: The book is titled: 'Man from Hjelmdall and the Wild Fire.'
fields.Placement: bookshelf near annette, around wholeness book (this triggers upon clicking wholeness book)

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / streetsign fuck the police
fields.Description: The street sign reads: "FUCK THE POLICE."
fields.Placement: corner of whirling in rags, the sign pointing south west

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / streetsign pigs go home
fields.Description: "PIGS GO HOME!" The street name is illegible.
fields.Placement: corner of whirling in rags, the sign pointing east

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / doomed number
fields.Description: Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 8B

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / whirling number
fields.Description: Closed for winter. Please use main entrance.
fields.Placement: on whirling in rags house number, on the side of the house that has the SIGN on it

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / sign to roundabout
fields.Description: To: Roundabout North
fields.Placement: on the two-way sign on the tree-fountain thingie on the bastion, pointing south-east

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / sign to apts
fields.Description: To: Capeside apts; Martinaise pier
fields.Placement: on the two-way sign on the tree-fountain thingie ont he bastion , pointing north

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / sign to gislaine
fields.Description: To: Rue de Saint-Ghislaine
fields.Placement: on the little sign near the stairs, pointing west

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / crack inland
fields.Description: Maybe a sea monster did this to the plaza?
fields.Placement: around the crack in the pavement orb, this triggers on clicking it

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / crack logic
fields.Description: The damage looks like it could've been caused by an earthquake.
fields.Placement: around the crack in the pavement orb, this triggers on clicking it

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / doomed cellar scent
fields.Description: The musty smell of a potato cellar in spring emanates from the air vent.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / bulletholes
fields.Description: A splatter of bullet holes lines the wall.
fields.Placement: down by the stairs that lead to the water, on the north-easter wall

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / bulletholes esprit
fields.Description: esprit the corps afterthought
fields.Placement: around the bulletholes orb near the stairs that lead to water (comments on clicking that)

fields.Title: PLAZA / mailbox
fields.Description: A mailbox on the plaza.

fields.Title: Add even more beauty to the wall
fields.Description: You have seen an exceptionally beautiful wall in Martinaise, near the pier, and have decided to add to its beauty, artistically. This will take a brush first? Who would have one? Then paint, and then the act itself.
fields.subtask_title_01: Find government-marked heavy fuel oil and return to the wall.
fields.subtask_title_02: Use fuel oil to paint the wall.

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / painting the wall
fields.Condition: CheckItem("cindys_brush")  and  CheckItem("fuel_canister_rcm")  and  Variable["TASK.add_even_more_beauty_to_the_wall"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.add_even_more_beauty_to_the_wall_done"] == false
fields.Description: FinishTask("TASK.add_even_more_beauty_to_the_wall_done")

fields.Title: YARD / HANGED MAN AUTOPSY
fields.Description:
This is phase two of the hanged man, after getting him down. 
1. Kim performs autopsy
2. More talk with inland

fields.Title: Open trash container
fields.Description: There's a locked trash container behind the Whirling-in-Rags. The manager, Garte, should have a key. Alternatively, you could use brute force to pry the lid open. You just need a prybar.

fields.Title: Interview the Wild Pines rep
fields.Description: Find the representative of the logistics company who owns the harbour, and ask her about the murder. She should be around here somewhere...

fields.Title: Interview the Union boss
fields.Description: Enter the harbour and seek an audience with the local Débardeur's Union leader, Evrart Claire -- you need to ask him about the murder in his District.

fields.Title: Perform field autopsy
fields.Description: The hanged man is down. Perform a closer inspection of his body, arriving at cause of death. This will need a form to be filled, in three parts.
fields.subtask_title_01: Find some gloves (optional).
fields.subtask_title_02: Bring chaincutters from Kim's toolbox in the Kineema.

fields.Title: Find out who is in the Union box
fields.Description: Garte has told you some unruly Union men gather in the mess hall of the Whirling-in-Rags. They're not there today, but most likely they'll eventually show up -- keep an eye out for them.

fields.Title: Speak to the assault victim
fields.Description: Go upstairs and knock on the door #3 to talk to the supposed victim of the hanged man. See what she has to say to you.
fields.subtask_title_01: Find Klaasje so you can question to her.
fields.subtask_title_02: Get Klaasje's version of events, tactfully.
fields.subtask_title_03: Confront the Hardie boys with what Klaasje told you.

fields.Title: Ask about Ruby in the village
fields.Description: Titus said Ruby -- the instigator of the lynching -- has a shack she rents on the coast. First go across the waterlock (south of Martinaise), then walk down the coast until you find a little fishing village. Ask around, the locals must have seen her.
fields.subtask_title_01: Ask the fisherfolk in the village -- maybe their leader knows something?
fields.subtask_title_02: The washerwoman is hiding something. Look around, maybe get into her shack somehow?
fields.subtask_title_03: You found a bullet in the washerwoman's shack. Ask her about it.
fields.subtask_title_04: Ruby left the village and went up the coast. Explore the coast for signs.
fields.subtask_title_05: Looking for Ruby brought you to a mural that you somehow think is important. Inspect it thorougly.

fields.Title: Return to the Whirling-in-Rags
fields.Description: Return to the Whirling after the whole Instigator debacle. Someone there has something to answer to.
fields.subtask_title_01: Survive the mercenary tribunal.

fields.Title: Go to the island
fields.Description: Go to the islet in the bay. There could be a boat in the fishing village, on the coast. Ask there.
fields.subtask_title_01: Use the Net Picker's skiff on the jetty and go to the island.

fields.Title: Run the number on the victim's armour
fields.Description: You discovered a serial number on the victim's ceramic armour boots. Run the number using Lieutenant Kitsuragi's shortwave in his motor carriage.
fields.subtask_title_01: Use Kim's shortwave to run the serial number.
fields.subtask_title_02: Call Alice back in a day for info on the armour's owner.
fields.subtask_title_03: Call Alice back in a day for info on the armour.

fields.Title: PIER ORB / yellow boat
fields.Description: The belly of this boat shines like it was recently painted.

fields.Title: PIER ORB / street sign south
fields.Description: Rue de Saint-Ghislaine -> Roundabout North

fields.Title: PIER ORB / plaque
fields.Description: Docking reserved for residents of: Rue de Saint-Ghislaine 33A
fields.Placement: down the stairs on the pier, on the stone wall there's a plaque-sign thingie. on that

fields.Title: PIER ORB / post in water
fields.Description: Looks like there was more construction here -- once, decades ago.
fields.Placement: On the stole pillar-post in the water, just off the pier

fields.Title: PIER ORB / street sign north
fields.Description: Capeside Apartments

fields.Title: Find your paperwork
fields.Description: Officers of the RCM carry a ledger with paperwork -- find yours so you'd be able to take official notes. Look around the yard. Something makes you think it's there.
fields.subtask_title_01: Check the Whirling trash container -- Sylvie said she threw out documents.

fields.Title: PIER ORB / inland beautiful
fields.Description: Shadows on the water... green plants under the calm surface.

fields.Title: SEAFORT / CUNO FUEL barks
fields.Description: Cuno reacts to fuel empty if task is on w/ BARK

fields.Title: Ask 'Scab Leader' about tattoos
fields.Description: Perhaps another mercenary can tell you more about the hanged man's tattoos, the so called 'Scab Leader' at the harbour gates. It won't count as one of the people informing you about the tattoos, but could be... interesting?

fields.Title: Spirit is eternal
fields.Description: The Horrific Necktie is getting ready for the end game. For the love of god do not remove it till 'the magic' happens.
fields.subtask_title_01: Buy the spirits from Rosemary.
fields.subtask_title_02: Hold onto the spirits and wait for the signal.
fields.subtask_title_03: Be ready, bratan!

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / medicinecabinet
fields.Description: An old medicine cabinet, newly stocked with drouamine.

fields.Title: PAWNSHOP ORB / grimwoman
fields.Description: A bust of a woman. The plaque simply says DEI.

fields.Title: FRITTE ORB / windowflowers
fields.Description: Yellow roses. Dozens of them. Tulips too.

fields.Title: FRITTE ORB / notthesameflowers
fields.Description: The yellow roses in the window -- those aren't the flowers that were left for Klaasje.

fields.Title: FRITTE ORB / noentry
fields.Description: The sign says: 'Employees Only.'

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / undonedishes
fields.Description: The dishes are drying. They smell of chemicals and pine trees.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / cuttingboard
fields.Description: The tomatoes are so thinly sliced, you can see through them.

fields.Title: EVART ORB / swordfishclock
fields.Description: A taxidermy fish that tells time.

fields.Title: APT ORB / drugsinbox
fields.Description: A blister pack of medicine peeks out of the box. You should take it!

fields.Title: BACKYARD / KIM BREAKING AND ENTERING barks
fields.Description: Kim bark after you enter the Communist Student room

fields.Title: APT ORB / bathroomdrugs
fields.Description: Mammi Mia! JACKPOT!

fields.Title: APT ORB / pathtonextroom
fields.Description: Someone has torn down the wall.

fields.Title: DOOMED S1 ORB / collapsedwall
fields.Description: The wall collapsed. It's inaccessible now.

fields.Title: DOOMED S1 / KIM WEAPON CACHE barks
fields.Description: Spoken when entering the hidden weapon cache with Kim

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / gymposter
fields.Description: The poster says: '*Citius* *Fortis*...' The rest is worn off.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK ORB / steelbeams
fields.Description: The central support beam has been destroyed by artillery fire.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK ORB / stonesfall
fields.Description: Stones fall. It's a long way down...

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / furniture
fields.Description: Antiquated office furniture. Last-century, maybe?

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / lastcentury
fields.Description: Brought down and forgotten, so long ago...

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / basementdoor
fields.Description: This collapse nearly sealed the basement. One can barely squeeze by.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / overturned
fields.Description: This overturned table is covered in orange mildew. Crawling with something...

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / darkwater
fields.Description: Dark water trails into the distance. There is no way out.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / giantpipe
fields.Description: A concrete pipe, buried in sand and dust.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / somethinghere
fields.Description: It feels... strange.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / buzzingworsens
fields.Description: It's getting louder, the buzzing sound...

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / doortorevolution
fields.Description: In the beam of the flashlight -- a crevice in the wall...

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / dustyglass
fields.Description: A series of thick, dusty panes of glass.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / wiresinglass
fields.Description: A brief convo with Interfacing about the times they made computer parts with glass

fields.Title: COAST ORB / redchair
fields.Description: You see a dark red chair in the dim light of the room.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / redchairconvo
fields.Description: The Red Chair Dialogue with Inland Empire.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / windyplanks
fields.Description: A cold breeze is enough to make the wall planks creak.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / trashtutorialone
fields.Description: There are bottles inside. You could pick them up if you had a bag!

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / trashtutorialtwo
fields.Description: If you had a bag in your hand, perhaps you could collect these bottles and sell them.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / hiddenhangover
fields.Description: A stash of hangover medication!

fields.Title: APT ORB / comebacklater
fields.Description: Just a door. Nothing for you here right now.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / wildpinescargo
fields.Description: White pine trees are printed onto the screen covering. Looks like a forest under snow.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / unionlogo
fields.Description: The banner sags under the weight of rain and snow: white waves on red.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / pylonpowerbox
fields.Description: A breaker box to power the radio pylon above you. Maybe there's something inside?

fields.Title: COAST ORB / doorforevershut
fields.Description: It's not only shut -- it's filled with concrete. No getting in here.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / wordsonsign
fields.Description: The sign says: "No Entry." Someone's scribbled an inverted star on it.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / swingpaint
fields.Description: Paint peels from the swing set in coin-sized flakes.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / bigblockades
fields.Description: Ahead: decades old concrete defences. Children play on them now.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / hearinggrove
fields.Description: Birds in the birch tree -- barely audible coos come from above.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / footprintsinsnow
fields.Description: Footprints in the snow. They lead away from the accident.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / brokenwindowdust
fields.Description: You see dust covered linens. Dried tulips on a bed.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / spinningtyre
fields.Description: A creaking ahead -- a broken axle grinding.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / theshot
fields.Description: The shot couldn't have come from here. Trees block the way.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / bushestoothick
fields.Description: The bushes are too thick and thorny to pass through.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / whettingstone
fields.Description: A whetting stone, well worn and covered in rust.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / jettycreak
fields.Description: The planks creak beneath your weight.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / cigaretteunlock
fields.Description: Stop. Between those trucks down there -- smokes. Go get 'em!

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / cookingpot
fields.Description: Cooking utensils. She has prepared herself porridge with bananas.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / collapsedpath
fields.Description: The tunnel collapsed. You'll have to find another way around.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / flashlight
fields.Description: It's so dark. Time to get out the flashlight.

fields.Title: PAWNSHOP ORB / cashregister
fields.Description: Some kind of machine. An antique cash register?

fields.Title: EVRART ORB / stairsup
fields.Description: A stair made of pallets leading up...

fields.Title: EVRART ORB / coffeeday
fields.Description: The coffee in the giant thermoses is still lukewarm.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / forkedpattern
fields.Description: More of the forked lightning pattern you saw outside.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / frostwindow
fields.Description: A figure drawn in frost on the window, depicting a deer.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / paneofglass
fields.Description: A cracked pane of glass.

fields.Title: HQ ORB / windowview
fields.Description: You see the waves, the sea, a church...

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / schematics
fields.Description: Schematics for a pinball machine -- futurism themed.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / buttersigndown
fields.Description: Butter sign down!

fields.Title: JAM ORB / tiretrackstoroof
fields.Description: Tyre tracks leading onto the roof. The slush and rain has almost washed them off.

fields.Title: WALKWAY ORB / watertankfinal
fields.Description: Collecting rainwater.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / coffeestuff
fields.Description: Industrial sized thermos. Smells like burnt coffee.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / radiorelayfinished
fields.Description: The radio relay hums with electricity.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / cannotpassfence
fields.Description: The fence blocks the path. No way on from here.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / redtarp
fields.Description: Vagrants have recently painted the tarp red. Water drips from it.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / tribalpaint
fields.Description: More tribalistic markings -- this post is covered in little humanoids.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / poleinice
fields.Description: A pole screwed into the ice keeps the tent erect.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / landfill
fields.Description: Trash from some unending party.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / blossomingallaround
fields.Description: Small white flowers blossom all around you...

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / lastdinghy
fields.Description: A rubber dinghy. It's deflated, broken.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / cranethought
fields.Description: KVALSUND means *Whale Fjord* in Ardan.

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / anthologies
fields.Description: Books. Mostly *fantastique* and historical fiction.

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / rangefinder
fields.Description: You see candles planted on a broken rangefinder.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / chalkboard
fields.Description: The blackboard is filled with complex equations. They look recent.
fields.Instruction:
SetVariableValue("church.orb_chalkboard_clicked", true) ;
Afterthought("CHURCH ORB / chalkboard interfacing")--[[ Variable[ ]]

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / chalkboard interfacing
fields.Description: Something to do with radio frequencies?

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / easy inland
fields.Description: A strange stillness fills you as you look ahead. You should *walk* here, not run.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / wooden figure
fields.Description: This grotesque wooden figure looks half-finished.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / figure inland
fields.Description: Feels like it's trying to become one with the church.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / figure concept
fields.Description: This figure was added later. It's not part of the original church.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / reel-to-reel tapes
fields.Description: Two decks of reel-to-reel tapes spinning on empty.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / more tapes
fields.Description: A portable Harmon Wowshi tape recorder.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / shivers
fields.Description: Cold wind blows in from the broken gallery... makes your skin crawl.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / window
fields.Description: Frost has drawn flowers on the glass, obscuring the view.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / pews
fields.Description: A prayer book has been left open.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / pews concept
fields.Description: Excerpts from the Perikarnassian litany of love.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / chemistry lab
fields.Description: This looks like a tiny chemistry lab.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / drug lab realization

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / distilled water

fields.Condition: Variable["church.drug_lab_visible"]  and  Variable["ice.andre_ok_drug_lab"]  and  Variable["church.orb_distilled_water"]  and  Variable["church.orb_chemistry_lab_clicked"]  and  Variable["church.orb_nosaphed_clicked"]
fields.Description: Cool, so this is where they've set up the drug lab.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / pews composure
fields.Description: A strange taste on your lips. Like blood -- or strawberries.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / more tapes logic
fields.Description: Is it possible it's... *recording* something?

fields.Title: APT ORB / bathroom smell
fields.Description: Expensive men's perfume lingers in the air.

fields.Title: APT ORB / painting
fields.Description: An old photo of the same apartment, dated year '01.

fields.Title: APT ORB / dishes
fields.Description: Dishes soaked up in a pot.

fields.Title: APT ORB / takeaway food
fields.Description: Old takeaway food boxes.

fields.Title: APT ORB / ashtray
fields.Description: An empty ashtray.

fields.Title: APT ORB / notes on fridge
fields.Description: Dates for open lectures at a local university.

fields.Title: APT ORB / flyers on fridge
fields.Description: Flyers for underground parties.

fields.Title: APT ORB / sadness empathy
fields.Description: A tinge of sadness -- this is a kids' room...

fields.Title: APT ORB / clock
fields.Description: The clock is ticking away with an odd cheerfulness.

fields.Title: APT ORB / clock concept
fields.Description: Its ticking makes you anxious. Rings hollow in the room.

fields.Title: APT ORB / balcony door
fields.Description: Cold is rushing in through the uninsulated balcony door.

fields.Title: APT ORB / heights
fields.Description: A chalk-drawn height chart for children's growth over the years.

fields.Title: APT ORB / red astra reaction
fields.Description: The same brand of cigarettes you found in the trash next to the deceased.

fields.Title: Close the water lock on Wednesday
fields.Description: To get to the coast you need to use the panel to close the water lock. It's been blocked, pending repairs, which should be done by Wednesday morning. (This will open up a new area in Martinaise.)

fields.Title: APT / smoker door orb
fields.Description: #28 -- A door to be remembered...

fields.Title: VILLAGE / POSSE 3
fields.Description: the end where you ask your final questions.

fields.Title: PIER ORB / joyce gone note
fields.Description: *Went to the village on the coast, officer. See you there! -- Joyce* says the note on the post.
fields.Placement: in martinaise pier, on a post near where joyce's boat is (but is no longer coz she sailed away). doesn't need to be visible note on the post, just pick a nice post or place where a note could be

fields.Title: Ask Kim to tell you about the case
fields.Description: Police officers get *briefed* about the cases they're given. Sometimes they *forget* the briefing, though, and need to be briefed again! Click on Kim and ask him about the case.

fields.Title: JAM / PALEDRIVER
fields.Description: A small, old, shrivelled up mesque woman with thinning hair sits awkwardly on the ledge of a lorry. An empty, glazed look adorns her eyes. She murmurs while nodding her head to the music coming from a radio in her lorry cabin. She wears a squared truck-driver flannel shirt with sleeves wrapped up to her elbows and blue denim dungarees tucked in yellow-brown (Caterpillar) boots.

fields.Title: VILLAGE ORB / halogen watermarks village
fields.Description: This is the village version of halogen watermarks, in front of kineema there
fields.Placement: in the fishing village, in front of kineema there. kineema also travels to fishing village and this is for the halogen watermarks quest, so ask yourself -- where exactly would kineema be shining its headlights when in village. player needs to stand IN FRONT of the car, in  its headlights, for orb to pop up

fields.Title: Inspect the window in Klaasje's bedroom
fields.Description: Go to her room, search it once more. Upstairs, in the bedroom -- the window. Perhaps it will yield *something*?
fields.subtask_title_01: Perform a thorough ballistics check of the window.

fields.Title: VILLAGE ORB / ask boat from netpicker
fields.Description: You should ask the owner before you take this boat to the island.
fields.Placement: on the boat in the village, when it's in the water already -- on the pier

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / slit wind blowing
fields.Description: Cold air seeps in through the embrasure.
fields.Placement: on the firing sliut in flak tower,, above sleeping mattress somewhere

fields.Title: SEAFORT DREAM ORB / on beach
fields.Description: Go down to the chain, there's something there...
fields.Placement: outside in sector two, on large sand area

fields.Title: SEAFORT DREAM ORB / in water
fields.Description: Further...
fields.Placement: on the water. this is when player is on water, to tell him it's okay, you're doing the right thing click further east.

fields.Title: Discover a new species
fields.Description: Find the cryptid called the *Insulindian phasmid* in Martinaise -- confirm its existence.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / oh god
fields.Description: Oh god...
fields.Placement: Around the phasmid. This should pop up when approaching the phasmid, but not right after exiting the deserter dialogue. On the way over there, when the phasmid is in the picture but you haven't clicked on him yet. 3-4 metre radius or so...

fields.Title: Find pyrholidon and slurp it
fields.Description: There is an extra special *fourth* substance in Martinaise, that no one talks about. Find it, slurp it. You may even start noticing bottles tucked away in Martinaise once you've seen one in your hand.

fields.Title: Prove your authority to Titus Hardie
fields.Description: You have to gain authority in Titus' eyes for the investigation to advance. Soften him up first. Maybe investigate the crime scene, or the body? Look for a witness? Get help from the Union boss, or the company rep? Tie them to any other crimes?
fields.subtask_title_01: Talk to Titus and establish authority in the Hardie boys' eyes.

fields.Title: FRITTE ORB / radio plays
fields.Description: A melancholy pop song plays on the radio.
fields.Placement: In fritte, on the counter between the wall and the glass stand, there is a real time radio asset. On that one.

fields.Title: Look for Ruby on the coast
fields.Description: Ruby was in the cinderblock village but left Monday. She could be anywhere on the peninsula, north of the village. Look inside the church. Ask around, there are people to the west of the mural. Or, I don't know... ask a girl on a date? Then ask her? Ask the wind maybe?
fields.subtask_title_01: Return to the 'Feld' mural and consult the wind if you don't know what to do. Other than that, keep searching the coast.
fields.subtask_title_02: Climb the ladder to the roof -- or find another way into the Feld building.
fields.subtask_title_03: Enter the building and let Kim in too.
fields.subtask_title_04: Explore the passages below the Feld building.
fields.subtask_title_05: Enter the cavern below the Feld building -- when you're ready. (NOTE! Union and cryptozoology business might end when you do.)
fields.subtask_title_06: Ruby's gone -- go to her tent.
fields.subtask_title_07: Look through the magazines in Ruby's tent.
fields.subtask_title_08: You've found Ruby's journal. Read it (see INTERACT tab in your Inventory).

fields.Title: HQ ORB / bedwithkim
fields.Description: Nice bed. You could sleep here -- later, once night has come.

fields.Title: The pissing competition
fields.Description: Apparently there was a pissing match between Precinct 41 (yours) and Precinct 57 (Kim's). Ask Kim about this after the initial inspection of the dead body is done.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / union box wall
fields.Description: Photos of men in overalls, toting guns and Union placards.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / hardie window clicked
fields.Description: You see hawthorn bushes outside. Hmm...

fields.Title: COAST ORB / summer house swing
fields.Description: The swing is missing -- no one's been here for a long time.
fields.Placement: On the swing, Rugged Coast, not the swing near the sunken motor carriage but the one further south, in the little yard

fields.Title: COAST ORB / abandoned summer house
fields.Placement: around COAST ORB / summer house swing (it's an afterthought of that)

fields.Title: COAST ORB / living under the boat
fields.Condition: Variable["coast.sense_coverdboat_clicked"]  and  Variable["village.has_shack"] == false  and  Variable["coast.boat_thought_done"] == false

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / bath
fields.Description: You see bottles in the bathtub: wine, beer and sweet liqueurs.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / MONEY
fields.Description: There's something on the table...

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 / door closed
fields.Description: The store on the other side is closed for the night. Come back tomorrow?

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / dice
fields.Description: This tray is full of dice -- colourful polyhedral dice. Hundreds of them.

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / container
fields.Description: The candy dispenser has been repurposed to contain thousands of dice.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / sports mags
fields.Description: Old sports magazines, tucked away in a dark corner.

fields.Title: Find the bullet before you get fooled
fields.Description: It is possible to determine the real cause of the hanged man's death -- before it's too late. You've just done it!

fields.Title: PIER ORB / cormoran
fields.Description: A lonely cormorant surveys the sea, indifferent to your approach.

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / witness logic

fields.Title: PIER ORB / paint origin
fields.Description: There's a girl up there -- did she spill the paint?

fields.Title: WHIRLING ROOF ORB / coffee cup

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / twentyeight afterthought
fields.Description: Complete silence. Whoever lives here isn't home.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / gloria
fields.Description: "Glory," says the graffito, "to the ghosts of us!"

fields.Title: COAST ORB / window hearing
fields.Description: Inside you hear the cosy sound of some kind of heater, sputtering.

fields.Title: VILLAGE / lily door closed
fields.Description: This door is closed for today. Time to put the kids to sleep.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / black swallow

fields.Title: COAST ORB / motor carriage tire
fields.Description: The rear tyre of a motor carriage adorns these reeds.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / tire encyclo
fields.Description: That's a Noland 'Vingt-Cinq', an unsuccessful model.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / tire empathy
fields.Description: Relax, it's not yours. You didn't crash every MC in Revachol. (Hopefully.)

fields.Title: COAST ORB / interfacing fire
fields.Description: It's almost impossible to get a fire going this near to the ocean.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / boat house afterthought
fields.Description: This section of the coast hasn't been used in decades.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / ticket afterthought
fields.Description: People paid money to park here? No one would pay now...

fields.Title: COAST ORB / phone afterthought
fields.Description: You can imagine why. Calls become *terrible* sometimes.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / motor carriage tire
fields.Description: The wheel of a motor carriage has been discarded in the reeds.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / tire empathy
fields.Description: Relax, it's not yours. Not every crashed MC is yours. (Hopefully.)

fields.Title: COAST ORB / tire encyclo
fields.Description: A Noland 'Vingt-Cinq', an unpopular model from the Thirties.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / canister elchem
fields.Description: Moonshine probably. Smells like tasty fermentation.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK / coin op vertigo

fields.Title: COAST ORB / clicked three
fields.Description: This is someone's home away from home. Just like yours.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / pattern idea
fields.Description: Bark beetles? No, it looks intentional. Some long forgotten style.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / spiderweb
fields.Description: A spider has spun its web around this wood-carved pillar.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / engine inside
fields.Description: The building before you housed the engine. Must have been a big one.

fields.Title: LANDS END / ladder afterthought
fields.Description: This relay tower coordinates boat traffic in the bay -- barely.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / clean foodstuff
fields.Description: These pots and plates are full of dust and spider-webs.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / snow shivers tutorial
fields.Description: You should come back here when it snows... A strange feeling. It passes quickly.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / note orb
fields.Description: Looks like she's left something on the table...

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / tire bumpers
fields.Description: These tyres are falling apart. They're at least 50 years old.

fields.Title: SEAFORD INT ORB / big blast door

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / leaky barell afterthought

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB/ dream water
fields.Description: You see her footprints on the water...

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / leg hurts dont run
fields.Description: Ouch, that leg hurts... maybe if you don't *run* it'll be okay?

INVENTORY / DOCUMENTS

fields.Title: Ask the pétanque player about may bells
fields.Description: The old guy in the uniform playing pétanque on the plaza -- he looks like a war veteran. Maybe he can tell you something about the may bells. Show them to him.

fields.Title: YARD / CUNO postbody barks
fields.Description: Cuno squats on the ground, high on speed.

fields.Title: PLAZA / GASTON rene dead barks

fields.Title: Ask René about the photo
fields.Description: The photo you found in the nightwatchman's booth -- the one with a happy couple. Ask René about it, he looked uncharacteristically happy in the picture.

fields.Title: Find the armoured gloves
fields.Description: The gloves of the hanged man armour might still be around in the neighbourhood. Try to locate them.
fields.subtask_title_01: A certain *Cindy the Skull* might know something about the victims armour. Ask her.
fields.subtask_title_02: Ask the little girl in the fishing village, down the coast, who knows something about the armoured gloves.
fields.subtask_title_03: Ask Little Lily in the fishing village, down the coast, if she knows something about the armoured gloves.
fields.subtask_title_04: Lily said she hid the gloves in the sandcastle behind her house. Go get them!

fields.Title: VILLAGE / LILLY SANDCASTLE

fields.Title: Do not talk to René and Gaston

fields.Title: COAST ORB / windowangle

fields.Title: COAST ORB / windownetpicker

fields.Title: COAST ORB / phasmidtrap

fields.Title: COAST ORB / thickice

fields.Description: Rhetoric tells you it's time to bone up on dialectical materialism and get organized.

fields.Title: Get yourself organised
fields.Description: You can't build communism alone. It's time to join your revolutionary brethren, develop your political consciousness, and put Mazovian theory into practice. But where have all the communists gone?
fields.subtask_title_01: Roam the streets to sniff out some comrades.
fields.subtask_title_02: Find the secret passphrase to Steban's meeting.
fields.subtask_title_03: Find out more about this 'ideólogo' Mañana mentioned.
fields.subtask_title_04: Attend Steban's meeting after 22.00 at the Capeside apartments.
fields.subtask_title_07: Return to the group for discussion.

fields.Title: GATES ORB / communistquest
fields.Condition: IsTaskActive("TASK.sniff_out_comrades")  and  Variable["gates.orb_rhetoric_communist_finished"] == false  and  Variable["cargo.evrart_asked_communists"] == false
fields.Description: Rhetoric smells a communist around here. Part of the Communist Dream Quest

fields.Title: APT / COMMUNIST MEETING DOOR
fields.Description: Door leading to the Storage Room where the Secret Communist Meeting takes place. (PART OF THE COMMUNIST DREAM QUEST)

fields.Title: APT / STUDENT COMMUNIST
fields.Description: The Student Communist and his underground reading group (PART OF THE COMMUNIST DREAM QUEST)

fields.Title: PIER ORB / communistquest
fields.Description: Rhetoric smells a communist around here. Part of the Communist Dream Quest

fields.Title: INVENTORY / LA FUMEE
fields.Description: Vol. 1 No. 2 of *La Fumée*, Martinaise's leading quarterly journal of radical Mazovian thought (PART OF THE COMMUNIST DREAM QUEST)

fields.Title: INVENTORY / INFRA-MATERIALISM GUIDE
fields.Description: An Introduction to the Theories of Ignus Nilsen (PART OF THE COMMUNIST DREAM QUEST)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / Moralist Quest Initiation
fields.Description: Empathy tells you it's time to take responsibility... by convening a committee to spread responsibility around.

fields.Title: Take on *la responsabilité*
fields.Description: Things down here are a *mess*. Someone really ought to do something about it. First, though, you and some other moralists should probably form a committee to decide whose job it is.
fields.subtask_title_01: Form a committee of moralists to assign responsibility. Kim might know where to start?
fields.subtask_title_02: Kim says you should keep your eyes peeled for moralists (may take a while).
fields.subtask_title_03: Kim says you should look for the Sunday Friend. The Smoker on the Balcony might know where he is.
fields.subtask_title_04: Kim says you should talk with Trant Heidelstam.
fields.subtask_title_05: The Smoker says his Sunday Friend has gone for a stroll along the coast.
fields.subtask_title_06: Find someone with technical expertise to contact the Coalition.
fields.subtask_title_07: Inspect the antenna at Land's End.
fields.subtask_title_08: Come up with a suitable location for a giant antenna.
fields.subtask_title_09: Find a working transceiver and return to the church.

fields.Title: JAM / COALITION WARSHIP ARCHER -- NOID VERSION
fields.Description: CUTSCENE where you attempt to contact Coalition Warship Archer with NOID. PART OF THE MORALIST DREAM QUEST

fields.Title: OFFICE / SECRETARYS RADIO
fields.Description: You can remove the transceiver from this radio as part of the MORALIST DREAM QUEST

fields.Title: COAST ORB / Empathy Afterthought
fields.Description: There's no way you'll reach the Coalition with this piece of junk...

fields.Title: WESTCOAST / SUNDAY FRIEND
fields.Description: PART OF THE MORALIST DREAM QUEST. You come across the Sunday friend enjoying the historical scenery. You also have the chance to apologise if you accused him earlier.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / Ultraliberal Quest Initiation
fields.Description: Savoir Faire tells you it's time to stop playing the market and make some real cash so you can fulfil your heart's desire.

fields.Title: Become a man of plenty
fields.Description: No more messing around. It's time to get rich for real! Just play the market right and you'll be a millionaire by the end of the week. Then you can get what your heart desires. Whatever it is...
fields.subtask_title_01: Find a starving artist and become their patron.
fields.subtask_title_02: Find a buyer for Cindy's art -- someone inconceivably *rich*.
fields.subtask_title_03: Get yourself a Personal Brand Strategist.
fields.subtask_title_04: Check out the horseback monument.
fields.subtask_title_05: Discuss the re-conceptualization with Idiot Doom Spiral.
fields.subtask_title_06: Check back on the monument re-conceptualization later.

fields.Title: PIER ORB / ultraliberal quest pre-cindy
fields.Description: Savoir Faire spots Cindy and gives you a pep talk before you try to negotiate for her art.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / ultraliberal dream quest
fields.Condition: IsTaskActive("TASK.sell_art_for_gains")  and  Variable["cargo.orb_ultralib_container_door_clicked"] == false  and  Variable["cargo.mrlb_greet_done"] == false
fields.Description: Savoir Faire hears wealth humming in the container -- whether it's raised or lowered. Also gives you instant access to MRLBG.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / STOCK CERTIFICATE
fields.Description: Read the Stock Certificate traded with MRLBG

fields.Title: JAM / MONUMENT REFLECTION
fields.Description: After the Tribunal, Harry reflects on the re-conceptualization of the horseback monument by Idiot Doom Spiral. (ULTRALIBERAL DREAM QUEST)

fields.Title: GATES / SCAB LEADER
fields.Description: Scab Leader, a large mercenary in disguise. Shouts a lot about LETTING US WORK, doesn't actually provide much information for now, except being suspicious and shouting.

fields.Title: GATES / MANANA
fields.Description: A jolly, easy-going man at the very bottom entrance to the gates. He gives information about the scabs, the strike, the union boss, Measurehead and being a boiadeiro.

fields.Title: ICE / NOID
fields.Description: Noid dialogue -- happens mostly inside church.

fields.Title: GATES / MEASUREHEAD
fields.Description: An übermensch monolith guarding the button to the harbour office door. Into "science"-anthropometry based racial theory.

fields.Title: WHIRLING / SLEEPING DOCKWORKER
fields.Description: Downstairs at the Whirling In Rags there's a sleeping dockworker. Interfacing people can steal his wallet and work pass, Phys inst can wake him up by yelling and then get some info on the Union and the strike.

fields.Title: PLAZA / RENE
fields.Description: René is in the shade, the forlorn option who's losing at the game.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / gaston cheating
fields.Condition: Variable["plaza.sense_gaston_sniveling"] == true  and  Variable["plaza.orb_gaston_cheating_done"] == false  and  IsDaytime()  and  IsDayUntil(5)
fields.Description: Cheating!
fields.Placement: In and around the crater on the plaza where the old play petanque, centered on Gaston

fields.Title: PLAZA / RENE barks
fields.Description: Playing pétanque.

fields.Title: PLAZA / GASTON barks
fields.Description: Playing pétanque and cheating.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / crack
fields.Description: Some great tectonic force has cracked the pavement, like an eggshell.
fields.Placement: on the crack in the pavement, near the staiurs

fields.Title: Talk to Garte, Lieutenant Love
fields.Description: Garte + Sylvie = ?? Something's going on here. You need to help a brother out with his love-woes. Go to Garte and give him some solid advice. Tell him how it *is* with women.

fields.Title: Where is the rest of the armour?
fields.Description: The hanged man's armour seems to be missing. Find out what happened to it. The kid throwing rocks at the corpse seems to be a good place to start. (Ask him about the body first.)
fields.subtask_title_01: Ask Cuno (the kid throwing rocks) what he knows.
fields.subtask_title_02: Go to the harbour gates, ask *the jolly Mesque* about the armour.
fields.subtask_title_03: Cuno lied to you. Return and confront him.

fields.Title: CANAL ORB / waterlock sign afterthought
fields.Description: Is this the water lock Lena mentioned?

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / took cut of lab
fields.Condition: Variable["church.drug_lab_visible"]  and  Variable["ice.andre_logic_cut"]  and  Variable["church.orb_distilled_water"]  and  Variable["church.orb_chemistry_lab_clicked"]  and  Variable["church.orb_nosaphed_clicked"]
fields.Description: Aha, the drug lab! Can't wait for the profits to start rolling in...

fields.Title: Inspect the traps
fields.Description: Check the traps for Morell the cryptozoologist, so he and his friend Gary can get some rest. There are four traps in total. After checking them all, return to Morell with the news.
fields.subtask_title_01: Check the trap near the boathouses, west of the Feld building.
fields.subtask_title_02: Check the trap Morell just set up, in the cryptozoologist camp.
fields.subtask_title_03: Check the trap in Land's End, far northeast of the Feld building.
fields.subtask_title_04: Check the trap near the canal you crossed, southeast of the village.
fields.subtask_title_05: The last trap was empty! Return to Morell in the Whirling with the news.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / feldwindowsbars
fields.Description: Bars cover these long, dusty windows.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / dizzyingheights
fields.Description: The gusts of wind, the height feels dizzying.
fields.Placement:
Area: Feld staircase toward the top
Details:

fields.Title: COAST ORB / bunkerseen
fields.Description: This is the bunker window.

fields.Title: Return to the dead body with Kim
fields.Description: There's a dead body on the Martinaise boardwalk down the coast. Return to it with the lieutenant and decide what to do with it.

fields.Title: ICE ORB / eternite logic
fields.Description: Before you, a drawbridge. It can only be lowered from the other side.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / cormorant reaction
fields.Description: To your right, a white-bellied cormorant eyes you suspiciously.

fields.Title: APT ORB / dont run
fields.Description: Don't run, okay? Take it slow when exploring the apartment. Be respectful.

fields.Title: What happened to the previous forewoman?
fields.Description: There are rumours that the previous forewoman of the Union just disappeared, right before the Claires took over. Her daughter called in on the election eve and said she wasn't running any more -- or coming to work. What happened?

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / dialogue pants
fields.Description: These are your sleek pants. Put them on and find THE KEY to get out of your room.
fields.Placement: THe trashed room upstairs, both rooms (living room and bathroom)

fields.Title: WHIRLING / Kim barks
fields.Description: Kim tells you he has a menu for questions after he's in the team.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / mess hall door
fields.Description: A sign reads: "Mess hall reserved for Union members. Doors open: 16:00."

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / mess hall window
fields.Description: Inside you catch a glimpse of Union paraphernalia: a strike poster, some red pennants.
fields.Placement: On the window to the mess hall downstairs, the right hand window -- NOT the one that has the pinball machine.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / water cooler
fields.Description: This is a water cooler. A large bubble is rising to the surface.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / menu
fields.Description: The menu has been wiped clean. Only the word MONDAY is written on it.
fields.Placement: On the blackboard menu on the wall

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / sound from kitchen
fields.Description: The soft purr of an electric juicer comes from the kitchen. Someone is working.
fields.Placement: In front  of the kitchen doors

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / kitchen door
fields.Description: The door is bolted. A sign reads: "Kitchen reserved for personnel until 13.00."

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / handwriting
fields.Description: A woman's hand wrote yesterday's menu. Today's starts in a man's handwriting.
fields.Placement: Around the blackboard with the menu, so clicking on  WHIRLING DOWNSTAIRS / MENU would trigger this

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / sea smell
fields.Description: The smell of the sea makes you dizzy.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / wind gush
fields.Description: A gust of briny wind washes over you.
fields.Placement: On the furthermoast edge of the Whirling balcony (if you walk against the railing as far out as you can)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / broken pinball
fields.Description: This Royal Pinball machine is unplugged.
fields.Placement: on the pinball machine in the corner

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / royalism theme
fields.Description: royalism themed afterthought
fields.Placement: Around the pinball machine in the corner of Whirling downstairs

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / spilled rum
fields.Description: A bottle of rum has been knocked over. Beautiful, dark liquid is spilling out...
fields.Placement: one the counter next to the long window of the diner, in the far south-west corner -- ont he sideways bottle there

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / alcohol impulse
fields.Placement: 2 m radius of the Spilled rum orb ( this trigger when you've clicke on the spilled rum)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / trompe le monde
fields.Description: This is the weekend edition of the satirical newspaper "Trompe le Monde".
fields.Placement: Upstairs hallway, on the counter  next to the stairs witht he two red chairs -- on the newspaper there. (Kasparov paneb vist kohe ajalehe ka)

fields.Title: YARD ORB / trash container logo
fields.Description: The letter "R" wears a crown. On the ribbon below: "A Light Above Descending."
fields.Placement: on the trash container in the yard. On the side, right below the "R"

fields.Title: YARD ORB / tree ladder
fields.Description: This kids' ladder is rickety but still climbable.

fields.Title: YARD ORB / ladder logic
fields.Description: The ladder's for kids -- it wouldn't hold the weight of a grown man.
fields.Placement: Just in front of the kids latter on the tree. This pops up once you've inspected the latter.

fields.Title: YARD ORB / greenhouse
fields.Description: Someone is trying to grow herbs in this greenhouse.
fields.Placement: On the greenhouse, pretty much in the middle of the side facing the viewer.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / balcony door
fields.Description: A sign on the door says the balcony is closed for spring.
fields.Placement: on the balcony door in the hallway

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / commodore red
fields.Description: This magnum-sized bottle of "Commodore Red" is empty.
fields.Placement: On the bottle thats rolled out your hand in the iontro scene upstairs

fields.Title: JAM / INSTIGATOR CABIN
fields.Description: The Instigator is gone but you can still explore the cabin of her abandoned vehicle. This yields some MAJOR foreshadowing.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / PLAISANCE
fields.Description: Inside the book shop. Speaking with the proprietor.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / CURTAINS
fields.Description: The curtains hanging in front of the back room. Curious trinkets attached. Very suspect. Can open, but Plaisance doesn't like that.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / KLAASJE DOOR
fields.OverrideDialogueCondition: (Variable["whirling.klaasjedoor_opened"] == true)  or  Variable["TASK.arrest_klaasje_done"] == true  or  Variable["whirling.klaasje_arrest_decision_made_did_not_arrest"] == true  or  Variable["TASK.report_to_the_tribunal_done"] == true  or  Variable["whirling.barreddoor_opened_from_the_inside"] == true
fields.Description: When the dialogue with Klaasje is over you can go and click and her door.

fields.Title: Find the Insulindian Phasmid
fields.Description: You've volunteered to restock the empty trap for the cryptozoologists. They even gave you fresh box of locusts. This could, after some messing around, *probably* lead to the discovery?
fields.subtask_title_01: First restock the trap you left empty before (the trick is to remember which one it was).
fields.subtask_title_02: You've restocked the trap -- now report to Lena in the Whirling.
fields.subtask_title_03: Lena is hiding something -- ask her what it is.

fields.Title: PLAZA / WORKING CLASS DRUNK barks
fields.Description: Barks from a working class man with a drinking problem. Triggers an authority orb if you've met the working class woman.

fields.Title: PLAZA / WORKING CLASS WOMAN
fields.Description: [Aimée.] A dialogue with a woman who has a job. And a husband. And kids.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / get a drink
fields.Condition: DayCount() == 1  and  Variable["plaza.orb_taredrunk_done"] == false  and  Variable["character.habit_alcohol"] == false
fields.Description: Start drinking (Electrochem).
fields.Placement: Near the tare drunk that appears on day 1.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / working class husband
fields.Condition: Variable["plaza.working_asked_about_husband"] == true  and  Variable["plaza.working_husband_bark"] == true  and  Variable["plaza.orb_wchusband_done"] == false  and  DayCount() > 1  and  IsHourBetween(7, 20)
fields.Description: AUTHORITY: It's a working class woman's drunk husband.
fields.Placement: plaza down the little staircase to the little alcove near the sea; where the working class drunk barks (not the drunk who has tare bag)

fields.Title: PLAZA / COIN-OPERATED VIEWER I
fields.Description: A coin-operated viewer on the plaza. It offers a view to the sunken sea-fort.

fields.Title: PLAZA / COIN-OPERATED VIEWER II
fields.Description: A coin-operated viewer on the plaza. It offers a view to the church.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / coin-operated viewer III
fields.Description: This coin operated viewer has been banged up, inoperable.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / RADIO barks
fields.Description: A radio tuned to an interisolar weather-station.

fields.Title: Find booze and drink it
fields.Description: The hangover feels really bad. You have to take the edge off. Find a bottle of alcohol, put it in your hand (equip it in the HELD slot in your INVENTORY), and the magic will happen by its own!

fields.Title: Getting the body down
fields.Description: Somehow make it so that the bloated corpse isn't up there any more. Shoot it down or ask for help. Do something, you're a cop.
fields.subtask_title_01: Access the harbour and ask for Evrart Claire's help.
fields.subtask_title_02: Go to Measurehead on the gates and ask him to get the body down.
fields.subtask_title_03: Go to the yard and see what Measurehead accomplished.

fields.Title: Find working class husband
fields.Description: The working class woman you met in front of the bookstore admitted that her husband is missing. Chances are the guy is drinking somewhere with his buddies. Find him and bring him home, if possible.

fields.Title: BACKYARD / STONE
fields.Description: First follow-up convo with Kim where you discover keys under the stone.

fields.Title: BACKYARD / KIM barks
fields.Description: Kim barks when you step in the courtyard.

fields.Title: BACKYARD / SMOKER ON THE BALCONY
fields.Description: The balcony overlooks the scene of the hanging but he's not a witness. He told as much to the investigator before, who you can ascertain was from Whitewater: foreshadowing for the HONOUR COURT's arrival later. EDITED VERSION

fields.Title: FRITTE / FRITTE CLERK
fields.Description: A dialogue with a bored teenage girl who works as a shop clerk.

fields.Title: FRITTE / TARE MACHINE
fields.Description: Right next to the glass-doored fridge.

fields.Title: JAM / HUMANITARIAN AID
fields.Description: Siileng, the humanitarian aid guy!

fields.Title: JAM ORB / broken security seals
fields.Description: The lead seals that secure the goods have been broken off.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / hum aid macaronis
fields.Description: Plastic-wrapped macaronis stamped with 'Humanitarian Aid'.

fields.Title: JAM / faln sneakers on a pedestal of speakers
JAM ORB / humanox
fields.Description: A bold slogan "HUMANOX" covers the truck.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / logic orb
fields.Condition: Variable["jam.siileng_noticed_humanox"] == true  and  Variable["jam.siileng_noticed_broken_security_seals"] == true  and  Variable["jam.orb_humanox_logic_done"] == false
fields.Description: logic afterthought about the humanitarian guy being all suspicious and whatnot

fields.Title: JAM ORB / hum aid tunafish
fields.Description: This says: 'Humanitarian Aid Tunafish. NOT FOR RESALE'.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / hum aid speakers
fields.Description: This says: 'Speakers from the People of Samara'.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / hum aid food
fields.Description: This says: 'Food Gift from the People of MESSINA'.

fields.Title: DOOMED / ELECTRONIC DOORBELL
fields.Description: This is a doorbell intercom that lets you call up all the failed businesses in the Doomed Commercial Area.

fields.Title: DOOMED / DICEMAKER
fields.Description: New thought: The Precarious World

fields.Title: DOOMED / CENTRAL FURNACE
fields.Description: This is an industrial oven on the first floor of Doomed. You can interact with it and contact Dicemaker.

fields.Title: DOOMED / BREAKER BOX
fields.Description:
Doomed cellar, breaker box. DONE. 

Get task finished for locate a fridge if you need to plug the fridge back in.

fields.Title: DOOMED / ICE CREAM MAKER
fields.Condition: Variable["doomed.icecreammaker_whitecheck_success"] == false  and  Variable["doomed.icebear_read_the_note"] == true  and  (Variable["doomed.orb_noticed_melting_ice_cream_maker"] == true  or  Variable["doomed.orb_noticed_frozen_ice_cream_maker"] == true)
fields.Description: Doomed cellar, a pistachio green ice cream maker next to the breaker box with a radio computer's filament memory inside. Difficulty: heroic, turns into easy if you've read the note from the Ice Bear Fridge.

fields.Title: DOOMED / ICE BEAR FRIDGE
fields.Description:
1. Has a note inside that points to the frozen ice cream maker that has the filament memory stored inside.
2. Reacting to the fact that there's a giant ice bear fridge still running them a loss.
3. This is where you put the hanged man. If hub reached then this is an instant solution for TASK.find_fridge / If has TASK.find_fridge then this is the solution.
4. The fridge can be turned off from the breaker box.

fields.Title: DOOMED S1 ORB / intercom wires
fields.Description: Intercom wires running into the breaker box.

fields.Title: DOOMED S1 ORB / cellar window
fields.Description: A cellar window: people's feet shuffling by on the street.

fields.Title: DOOMED S1 ORB / frozen ice cream maker
fields.Description: A frozen ice cream maker that's still running.

fields.Title: DOOMED / HIDDEN WEAPONS CACHE
fields.Description: Weapons hidden inside the wall. Kim reacts to the room (revolution etc) and you obtain an antique rifle that it seems to have a bullet in it. Lootable item: antique_rifle. You can get a bullet and compare it with the hanged man's.

fields.Title: DOOMED S1 ORB / old weapons
fields.Description: Two rusty rifles are hidden above the piping; they look inoperable.

fields.Title: DOOMED S1 ORB / more old weapons
fields.Description: Someone has stuck some busted guns beneath the ceiling.

fields.Title: DOOMED S1 ORB / coal chute
fields.Description: The wind howls in from the coal chute above.

fields.Title: DOOMED S1 ORB / regular ice cream maker
fields.Description: An ice cream maker, defrosted and unplugged.

fields.Title: Help Revachol Ice City cut losses
fields.Description: Help Revachol Ice City cut their losses by plugging out the giant ice bear fridge. It's located in the cellar of the Doomed Commercial Area.

fields.Title: FRITTE / KNICK-KNACKS STAND
fields.Description: The counter.

fields.Title: FRITTE / APOTHECARY
fields.Description: A small cabinet on the wall, right next to the posters.

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / punchbag
fields.Description: Sand is dripping from a punchbag...

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / wallbars
fields.Description: Worn-out wallbars. They look unsafe.

fields.Title: DOOMED / BARBELL
fields.Description: You can lift the barbell.

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / windows
fields.Description: The hallway is blocked by old windowpanes and debris.

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / fashionthought
fields.Description: But where are the clothes it used to display?

fields.Title: JAM / TOMMY
fields.Description: At the plaza, near Kim's Kineema you may talk to an anxious truck driver. The man's come to stretch his legs. Here you will find information on: traffic jam, the closed gates, the other truck drivers, FALN. + Learn some background on the geography of Le Caillou. Possibly acquire one piece of the FALN clothing set. (Includes poetry white check.)

fields.Title: INVENTORY / GREATEST INNOSSENCE
fields.Description: "The Greatest Innocence" by João Paolo Salomao Lopez de Fuego.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / COCKATOO
fields.Description: From A to Zrieek! Guide to a Well-Behaved Cockatoo. (Helen)

fields.Title: INVENTORY / HJELMWOMAN
fields.Description: Man from Hjelmdall and the Devil Woman.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / WIRRAL MODULE
fields.Description: Super-popular binoclard fantasy board game (module), feat. faeries and welkin and pygmies and such fantasy folk. The non-grimdark pastoral-bucolic version with maps & miniatures. Basic Wirral info.

fields.Title: DELETE THIS FOLDER
fields.Description: delete

fields.Title: DELETE THIS FOLDER
fields.Description: delete
fields.Placement: An afterthought that pops up over your head-twirly-afterthought thing after you've listened to the onomatopoetic lorryman long enough.

fields.Title: GATES ORB / mysteryeyes
fields.Description: There's a mysterious pair of eerie eyes peeking through the gap between the main gates.
fields.Placement:
Area: Orb on the large gate itself, in the middle, where the doors collide. 
Details: Someone is peeking through the small gap between the gates. What a suspicious pair of spying eyes.

fields.Title: GATES / BABEONE barks
fields.Description: One of Measurehead's awesomely hot companions who barks mocking stuff at you (on clicking).

fields.Title: GATES / ANOTHERBABE barks
fields.Description: One of Measurehead's awesomely hot companions who barks mocking stuff at you (on clicking).

fields.Title: GATES ORB / harbour sounds
fields.Description: Rumbling and creaking can be heard from behind the large gates.
fields.Placement:
Area: somewhere on the gates, either before or afterclubber
Details:

fields.Title: GATES ORB / interfacing afterthought
fields.Description: There's no lockpicking or door-kicking this one.

fields.Title: GATES / WOMENS RIGHTS first phase barks
fields.Description: Barks for WR protester. If it comes out interesting and fun, and not some sort of boring shit unimaginative garbage.

fields.Title: GATES / CHILLBABE barks
fields.Description: Third of Measurehead's awesomely hot companions who also maybe barks mocking stuff at you (on clicking). Or might not, if she's the one sitting behind Measurehead, out of your reach.

fields.Title: GATES / MYSTERIOUS EYES
fields.Description: Interactable object (the gap in the gates) leads to a dialogue with the spooky pair of eyes.

fields.Title: The Jam Mystery
fields.Description: Someone's using Terminal B to smuggle raw ingredients of drugs into Revachol. Joyce said there are 3 drivers at the intersection. Talk to them, one of them *must* know something about the drug trade.
fields.subtask_title_01: Interrogate the drivers about the smuggling.
fields.subtask_title_02: Find out who's the lady driver and where's her lorry.
fields.subtask_title_03: Search through the lady driver's lorry cabin near the monument.
fields.subtask_title_04: Report back to Joyce.

fields.Title: Call your station's lazareth
fields.Description: Kim suggested you call the station lazareth in order to sort out your health issues. You can use his motor carriage to make the call, although you don't feel hopeful.

fields.Title: Investigate Doomed Commercial Area
fields.Description: People say the commercial building on the plaza is cursed; no business will ever thrive there without going bankrupt. You promised Plaisance you'll look into it. Enter the sealed door behind the bookstore and find out what happened to the companies there.
fields.subtask_title_01: Search for the 'malignant Entity'. Plaisance said she lives inside a chimney -- find a way in.
fields.subtask_title_02: Ask the Novelty Dicemaker about the bankrupt companies.
fields.subtask_title_03: Ask the Novelty Dicemaker about the curse.
fields.subtask_title_04: Report back to Plaisance about your findings.

fields.Title: GATES ORB / noticesign
fields.Description: A notice: "IN CASE OF A STRIKE -- PRESS BUTTON BEHIND GUARD"
fields.Placement:
Area: a sign somewhere next to the door and the keypad, on top of the staircase at the Gates area. 
Details:

fields.Title: JAM / RACIST barks
fields.Description: barks for the bark god, blood for the blood throne!

fields.Title: JAM ORB / cargohold
fields.Description: Goods from the lorry haphazardly litter the surroundings.
fields.Placement:
Area: orb appears in the back end of the lorry belonging to the racist lorrydriver (its the one next to Tommy's lorry. the one with the back of the trailer open)
Details:

fields.Title: JAM ORB / tendetectives
fields.Description: A glossy magazine: "Most Able-Bodied Men". This issue hosts a top 10 list.
fields.Placement:
Area: On the magazine rack behind racist lorryman
Details:

fields.Title: JAM ORB / detectivethought
fields.Description: Oh, no! They're *much* hunkier than you!

fields.Title: JAM ORB / trash bin
fields.Description: A sticker on the bin reads: "RCM Emergencies Desk no 8-100-2. Mankind, be vigilant!"
fields.Placement:
Area: trash bin near magazine stand, next to frittttttte
Details:

fields.Title: JAM ORB / frittethought
fields.Description: Three Ts! How idiomatic.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / frittestore
fields.Description: FRITTTE (SIC!)

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / millionart
fields.Description: A vaguely androgynous portrait of a man.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / hairdrier
fields.Description: Ghostly silhouettes of hairdriers.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / hairdrierthought
fields.Description: No sane person would ever put their head in to such machine.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / millionstar
fields.Description: Looks like Guillaume Le Million... that hair poster.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / PRIMERBOOK
fields.Description: A primer-book (quest item for Arx)

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / greatideas
fields.Description: A quaint picture book brochure. Very colourful.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / TEQUILA DOOR
fields.Description: The dialogue between you and the door to your room. It is locked unless you've paid for damages.

fields.Title: VILLAGE / SHACK DOOR
fields.Description: The shack door dialogue, if you have gained access to the shack where you can sleep. It's locked until you get it from the Washerwoman.

fields.Title: VILLAGE / NETPICKER
fields.Description: You see a middle-aged woman with a tea-length skirt, rubber boots and a rain jacket. Brown, curly hair, a sword on her side. She doesn't notice you.

fields.Title: VILLAGE / BOAT
fields.Description: This is the boat you can get from the Net picker. This boat takes you to the Sea Fortress island.VILLAGE ORB / ask boat from netpicker

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / GORACY KUBEK
fields.Description: A dialogue with a kojko cook Gorący Kubek. He doesn't speak a word from your language, but for some reason understands all your questions about disposing the corpse??

fields.Title: VILLAGE ORB / boat
fields.Description: The underside of the boat has recently been tarred.
fields.Placement:
Area: on the boat which is on the shore, bottom side up, tar drying in the sun
Details:

fields.Title: End-of-day debrief with Kim
fields.Description: Kim can answer any lingering questions you may have about the case and the RCM. Join him on the Whirling-in-Rags' balcony after 22:00, when you're calling it a day.

fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / DEBRIEF DAY ONE
fields.Description:
1. Kim smokes.
2. How did the day go? 
3. What are our powers and what is the RCM?
4. What is the Moralintern? 
5. What do you think of Martinaise, Kim?

fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / DAY TWO UNION
fields.Description: Kim blinks red when he's joined your team near the stairs. He wants to tell you the vigilantes have showed up and that you should talk to them -- but be careful. (Final warning about RCM non-presence in Martinaise.)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / MEDICINE CABINET
fields.Description:
Klaasje's medicine cabinet.
1) Find speed (Saint-Batiste goodstuff)
2) Find barbiturates, benzos, SOS and narcan
3) check to steal speed if kim there

fields.Title: THOUGHT / GOSSAMER STATE
fields.Description: Savoir Faire convinces you on the merits of being an Ultraliberal -- Gossamer State.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / WORLD REPUBLIC
fields.Description: Rhetoric talks about Communism --The World Republic.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / BORING COP
fields.Description: Drama informs you are a Boring Cop.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / SUPERSTAR COP
fields.Description: Composure confirms that you're a Superstar Cop.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / KINGDOM OF CONSCIENCE
fields.Description: Empathy informs you that you are a Moralist. Kingdom of Conscience awaits.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / APOCALYPSE COP
fields.Description:
Shivers is all about being an Apocalypse Cop.

Thou art the harbinger of doom, embrace thine destiny.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / SORRY COP
fields.Description:
Suggestion tells you all about being a Sorry Cop.

... I am SORRY!!! Sorry for everything! Sorry for being *me*!

fields.Title: THOUGHT / HONOUR
fields.Description: Authority discusses how you are... The rarest of police officers

fields.Title: THOUGHT / REVACHOLIAN NATIONHOOD
fields.Description: Endurance explains you are a Fascist. It's all about the Revacholian Nationhood.

fields.Title: CANAL / WORKER barks
fields.Description: Barks for workers loitering by the canal after fixing the water lock.

fields.Title: WESTCOAST / GARY
fields.Description: Gary the Cryptofascist is a friend of Morell's. Also trying to find the cryptid. Wears armour stolen from the hanged man under his clothes. Has Man from Hjelmdall books etc.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / reeds at lands end
fields.Description: These reeds are in the north, at Land's End. The interactable reeds you can search when Morell tells you to check the phasmid traps. There are traps in these reeds.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / reeds by feld
fields.Description: These reeds are somewhere near Feld. The interactable reeds you can search when Morell tells you to check the phasmid traps. There are traps in these reeds.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / reeds near sunken car
fields.Description: These reeds are near your sunken car. The interactable reeds you can search when Morell tells you to check the phasmid traps. There are traps in these reeds.

fields.Title: PLAZA / KORTENAER
fields.Description: Previously known as Scab Leader. Wears a huge and intimidating set of armour. He is drunk and pissed off at his friend getting killed. He carries a big-ass gun.

fields.Title: The Missing Insects Case
fields.Description: Some locusts have gone missing, and the Insulindian phasmid has yet to be found. Perhaps you can use your detective skills to help out the cryptozoologists?
fields.subtask_title_01: Find out the real reason why the trap was empty. Local kids might know.
fields.subtask_title_02: Ask Cuno about the empty trap, then take a look around the yard.
fields.subtask_title_03: Confront Cuno about the locusts.
fields.subtask_title_04: Cuno has promised to stop. Report your findings to the cryptozoologists.
fields.subtask_title_05: Tell Morell that you found the locusts in the shack.

fields.Title: SEAFORT / BOAT
fields.Description: You're gonna need to boat yourself back somehow after everything is done.

fields.Title: VILLAGE / JUDIT MINOT barks
fields.Description: your old posse; formerly: horse faced woman

fields.Title: VILLAGE / TRANT HEIDELSTAM barks
fields.Description: your old posse. formerly near FELD electrics building with his kid

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / KIM DOOR
fields.Description: The door to Kim's room on floor two of Whirling-in-Rags
fields.Placement:
Area: door #2 on second floor of Whirling.
Details:

fields.Title: HQ / WASHBASIN
fields.Description: A washbasin An interactable dialogue where you can shave your beard/muttonchops! This changes the portrait in the mirror dialogue, and the one on UI.

fields.Title: SOUTHCOAST / SUNKEN MOTOR CARRIAGE
fields.Description: Tyre tracks lead to a sunken motor carriage.
fields.Placement:
Area: the sunken motor carriage in the sea. much fun
Details:

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / STEEL DOOR
fields.Description: The steel door in the back of the kitchen. Leads to the storage area with the elevator.

fields.Title: JAM / HORSEBACK MONUMENT
