fields.Description: On the traffic island in the jam, an old monument of Filippe III The Squanderer pointing towards an unknown location in the sea. The chest region seems to have suffered chip damage.

fields.Title: APT / MAZOV BUST
fields.Description: This is the bust of Kras Mazov. Finishes "Find out if you're Kras Mazov" task.

fields.Title: APT / WCW MAIN
fields.Description: Working Class Woman in her room, apartment #20.

fields.Title: APT / TOMAS THE SPONSOR
fields.Description: The sponsor, in Smoker's apartment #28.

fields.Title: APT / CUNO DAD
fields.Description:
Cuno's dad, loitering on the bed. Drugs. Sleeping with his eyes open. His face reminds you Cuno 30 years later. Also seems like he's dead. Hairy ginger chest, in undewear. Kim reacts. Hearing redcheck while he gurgles, success: he's trying to call you pigs. 


I talked to your dad boolean. / I was somehow able to not evade your dad.

fields.Title: VILLAGE / ABIGAIL
fields.Description: Don't Call Abigail -- a member of the Union of Moribund Alcoholics, who talks about (not calling) Abigail.

fields.Title: VILLAGE / ROSEMARY
fields.Description: Rosemary (previously known as Under Control) -- the member of the Union of Moribund Alcoholics who sells you booze, smokes etc.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK / THE PIGS
fields.Description: The Pigs! Evrart arranges you to meet the woman who has been posing as a police officer. She's carrying an attachment of sirens and police lights. She's got your gun.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK / TRANT HEIDELSTAM INTRO
fields.Description:
Trant Heidelstam is chilling near the FELD building, with kid, piggy-bank. You can:
1. Learn about the FELD building.
2. Get useless advice.

fields.Title: CHURCH / MAINFRAME
fields.Description: Mainframe. Related to Doomed-Soona-questline related stuff.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK / PAYPHONE
fields.Description: Payphone, for calling folk. Call everyone.

fields.Title: CHURCH / TIAGO
fields.Description: Tiago the Crab Man.

fields.Title: CHURCH / SOONA
fields.Description: Soona the Palediver.

fields.Title: APT / SMOKER DOOR
fields.Description: DOOR, APARTMENT #28 (SMOKER ON THE BALCONY)

fields.Title: APT / WCW DOOR
fields.Description: DOOR, APARTMENT #20 (WORKING CLASS WOMAN)

fields.Title: APT / CUNO DAD DOOR
fields.Description: DOOR, APARTMENT #12

fields.Title: APT / MAZOV DOOR
fields.Description:
DOOR, APARTMENT #11 (turns into door. can lockpick and get into?)

1. Use the wirecutters to cut the chain.
If you don't have them, the door suggests it. The chain is very flimsy. 
Exactly the same structure as other doors. 

1. Observe the padlock. - the weakness here is in chain.

Option to get a task if you do not have the chaincutters.

fields.Title: Find the traffic hooligan
fields.Description: A half-insane joyrider has jumped over the canal. See if you can find evidence of his reckless activity in west, on the coast.
fields.subtask_title_01: First you should find the vehicle the joyrider used in their escapades.
fields.subtask_title_02: You found the joyrider's vehicle -- see what's inside to identify his IDENTITY!

fields.Title: VILLAGE / JOYCE barks
fields.Description:
Joyce barks for when she's in the village.

I dared not to move it to her actual folder, cause it's already been inputted and I didn't wanna fuck it up.

fields.Title: VILLAGE / NETPICKER barks
fields.Description: NETPICKER barking

fields.Title: LANDS END / NETPICKER
fields.Description: A dialogue featuring you, Kim, Lilienne the Netpicker, about the sun (if it's rising, setting or high in the sky) -- what the sun is, what means. THE SETTING SUN

fields.Title: Meet Lilienne at Land's End
fields.Description: You have a date with Lilienne. Get to Land's End -- in the northern tip of the peninsula -- quickly, she's not going to wait for you forever.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / stew
fields.Description: An aroma of spices, alcohol, and tomato hangs in the air...

fields.Title: OFFICE ORB / file cabinet
fields.Description: A standard office file cabinet. The drawers seem to be locked.

fields.Title: HQ / EXIT BULLET difficult
fields.Description: The bullet you find in the shack, hinting that someone else has been staying here. Secretly.

fields.Title: HQ ORB / floorboard
fields.Description: The floorboards creak under your step.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / MAP WALL
fields.Description: Different maps attached to the wall. Including the Map of Martinaise (fast travel?)

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / HJELMSERIES
fields.Description: A shelf full of Hjelmdall books. There are so many.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / ROMANCE
fields.Description: Shelf of romance books.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / CRIME
fields.Description: Shelf of crime books.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / BOARD GAME MOUNTAIN
fields.Description: A mountain of different board games.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / nomillion
fields.Description: Merely looking at that unmanly haircut threatens your masculinity.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / windoworb
fields.Description: Gift books and molten candy.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / balconyorb
fields.Description: Another boring book. Just discarded here.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / stufforb
fields.Description: The book collects the national recipes of Arda. They are all about lake trout.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / shelforb
fields.Description: It's a... *Tome of Fascist Magic*. Rather candid.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / BIOGRAPHIES
fields.Description: Shelf full of biographies of famous people.

fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / JOYCE DRUGS
fields.Description: Little talk to Kim where he discusses undertaking the jam mystery w you

fields.Title: LAIR / Door to Outside
fields.Description: This prevents the player from leaving the main lair -- only fires if they have dealt with Ruby but not read her journal.

fields.Title: LAIR / Door to Stairwell
fields.Description: This prevents the player from leaving the main lair -- only fires if they have dealt with Ruby but not read her journal.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / dark celebration 2
fields.Condition: (Variable["boardwalk.ruby_killed_herself"] == true  or  Variable["boardwalk.ruby_ran_away"] == true)  and  Variable["whirling.necktie_personified"]  and  CheckEquipped("neck_tie")  and  CheckItem("blue_medicinal_spirit")  and  Variable["boardwalk.orb_dark_celebration_done"] == false
fields.Description: An afterthought to Ruby's scene whether she kills herself or runs away -- exists outside Ruby by Rosemary as redundancy

fields.Title: PLAZA / GASTON
fields.Description: Florid and jolly, Gaston Martin is standing in a sunspot and loudly eating a giant ham sandwich.

fields.Title: YARD / CUNOESSE
fields.Description:
Talk to Cunoesse to find out she's a girl.

"I have nothing interesting say, talk to Cuno!"

Or approach her from the backyard to catch her off-guard and have something-resembling an actual dialogue with her.

fields.Title: Replace lost boule
fields.Description: Due to some confusion over the game René and Gaston are playing, you threw one of their pétanque *boules* far in the sea. The shot was excellent, but now you owe them a *boule*... or at least similar-looking metal sphere.

fields.Title: Make truce with Cuno
fields.Description: You tried to punch Cuno and failed catastrophically. Now you need to make a truce with him to gain access to his knowledge. Offer him something he might like. Smokes? A "Man from Hjelmdall" book?

fields.Title: Find your other shoe
fields.Description: Seems like your green snakeskin shoe is missing its partner. You should find it before you go venturing into the wild unknown. Two shoes are better than one -- unite them again.

fields.Title: Interview cafeteria manager
fields.Description: The cafeteria manager of the Whirling-in-Rags might know something about the murder that happened in the yard. Ask him about it.

fields.Title: Inspect victim's body
fields.Description: Inspect the body hanging in the back yard of the Whirling-in-Rags. This is a preliminary inspection, you just need to suppress the urge to throw up and approach it.
fields.subtask_title_01: Get ammonia from the gardener or the Frittte store, it'll make it easier.
fields.subtask_title_02: Equip and complete "Volumetric Shit Compressor" thought.
fields.subtask_title_03: You're in, do a preliminary inspection of its different parts.

fields.Title: Report your badge missing
fields.Description: You need to report your missing badge to the 41st Precinct as soon as possible. The lieutenant said that you can use the radio in his motorcar to call your station.

fields.Title: Find money for rent and pay Garte
fields.Description: You need to find 20 reál to pay for your room at the Whirling, or it will be locked after 21.00. As long as you don't have a free place to stay you have to do this every night.

fields.Title: Pay for damages
fields.Description: You need to pay for the damages you caused in the Whirling-in-Rags, or you won't have a place to stay tonight. Ask around for money and be careful with your spending. If you're unsure how much you owe, ask Garte.
fields.subtask_title_01: Ask your station for additional funds.
fields.subtask_title_02: Try negotiating with cafeteria manager.
fields.subtask_title_03: Kim has offered to help -- go to his motor carriage in front of the Whirling.
fields.subtask_title_04: Take spinner hubcaps to local pawnshop, south of the plaza.
fields.subtask_title_05: Return to Garte with spinner cash.

fields.Title: Find smokes and smoke them
fields.Description: You need to get your hands on some cigarettes and then smoke them... for those massive bonuses. Find a pack, put it in your hand (equip it in the HELD slot in your INVENTORY), and the smokes will do the rest.

fields.Title: Talk to Garte for Sylvie
fields.Description: Sylvie asked you to talk to Garte and tell him she's sorry. Go to the cafeteria manager and relay the news, maybe it will help you somehow?

fields.Title: Talk to Joyce about the pale without Kim
fields.Description: Lieutenant Kitsuragi does not want you to hear about something called the *pale*, probably thinking it will prove traumatic. Return to Joyce once he is not there, and ask her about it. *Or* get him to step away for a second.

fields.Title: Track down your badge
fields.Description: It's unclear how you should go about finding a tiny piece of plastic in a world as huge as this. Maybe you'll just *stumble* across it, down the line? Miracles happen.

fields.Title: KINEEMA ORB / torque talk
fields.Condition: IsKimHere() and  IsDayFrom(2) and  Variable["plaza.orb_kineema_torque_done"] == false
fields.Description: Kim has a sweet ride, the Coupris Kineema - the sports version of the Coupris 40 police motor-carriage. You should definitely talk about it.

fields.Title: KINEEMA / SYLVIE
fields.Description: Your wildly successful phone call to Sylvie Malaiika.

fields.Title: YARD / CUNO
fields.Description:
* All greeting except "Making amends".
* Throwing up advice.
* Buy pants.

fields.Title: YARD / PILE OF ETERNITE
fields.Description: Someone has left some crumbly looking eternite panels leaning against this wall. Most suspicious.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART
fields.Description:
Evrart Claire is the head of the Dockworkers' Union. Wealthy, lazy, smart cat - player.

In this dialogue you can:

* Enlist Evrart's aid to get the body down (he asks measurehead to do it).
* Get bent and earn a daily income by doing so (corrupt cop).
* Find out about the neighbourhood.

fields.Title: EVRART ORB / nighttime desk
fields.Description: The desk has been cleaned out for the night.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / EASY-LEO
fields.Description: A simpleton dockyard-worker. Only person besides Evrart and Mega-Rich left in the container yard. He's making a banner.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / stone spheres
fields.Description: Enormous *boules* worthy of a real man.
fields.Placement: on one the stone balls near the stairs

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / doomed cellar y
fields.Description: There is something down there...
fields.Placement: on the cellar window bars below the eastern bookstand

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / sea hearing
fields.Description: You hear the distant squall of seabirds.
fields.Placement: on the stairs that lead to the sea

fields.Title: APT / EMPTY ROOM DOOR
fields.Description: APARTMENT #10. A door leading to the apt with a real estate agent.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / erotica half light
fields.Description: The book appears to be erotica. But without actual erotica.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / boiadeiroculture
fields.Description: The book says you must attain a *Franconigerian hardbody*. At the nearest gym.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / book jankaus
fields.Description: It takes willpower to even read the author's name: Jan Kaus. From Igaunia.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / loos radio city
fields.Description: You memorize the title: Loos, '87: Radio City. Seems important.

fields.Title: PLAZA / THE GARDENER
fields.Description: The Gardener stands on the corner of Whirling and is there to help you navigate the streets of Martinaise. Later it turns out she's a Union spy. You get to know from here that Joyce is in town.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / kim in your room
fields.Description: Kim tries not to look at your broken down bathroom door.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / LEO new barks
fields.Description: Replacement barks for Leo to test out.

fields.Title: WHIRLING / SLEEPER barks
fields.Description: Zzzzzzz...

fields.Title: COAST ORB / boardwalkexplainer
fields.Condition: Variable["TASK.check_boardwalk"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.check_boardwalk_cancelled"] == false  and  Variable["boardwalk.orb_where_shot_came_viscal_done"] == false  and  Variable["boardwalk.gate_is_open"] == false  and  Variable["boardwalk.drainage_door_opened"] == false
fields.Description: Nothing on the boardwalk suggests the sniper shot came from here. Maybe something will turn up later?

fields.Title: COAST ORB / boardwalkagainexp
fields.Condition: Variable["TASK.check_boardwalk"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.check_boardwalk_cancelled"] == false  and  Variable["boardwalk.orb_where_shot_came_viscal_done"] == false  and  (Variable["boardwalk.gate_is_open"] == true  or  Variable["boardwalk.drainage_door_opened"])
fields.Description: No trace of the hanged man's shooting *on* the boardwalk -- maybe look *under* it again?

fields.Title: Who put the clothes in the trash?
fields.Description: The victim's clothes were in the trash container out back, neatly folded. Who could have put them there, and why? Only the Whirling staff was supposed to have the key.
fields.subtask_title_01: Ask Cuno if he knows anything about the victim's clothes in the trash.
fields.subtask_title_02: Ask Garte if he knows how the victim's clothes got in the trash.
fields.subtask_title_03: Who else has unauthorized access to the Whirling trash? Find this person and you'll know who tampered with the scene. (It may take a while.)
fields.subtask_title_04: Analyze Gary's composure to find out if he's hiding something more.

fields.Title: Style your paperwork
fields.Description: You and your Conceptualization skill have decided to style that paperwork so it'd be cooler somehow. Be on the lookout, but know -- this will take *time*.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / LEDGER OF FAILURE
fields.Description:
Perform a closer inspection of the ledger found in the trash (your official paperwork). Find:
1. serial number
2. forms
3. notes on cases
4. wife's letter
5. toilet smell

fields.Title: Read your ledger and name the case
fields.Description: This case needs an official name. Go to your INVENTORY, and INTERACT with the Damaged Ledger to give it one. (Finding the right line may take some time.)

fields.Title: YARD / HANGED MAN BULLET
fields.Description:
This is the final phase of the hanged man:
1. White check to find bullet
2. Failure to find fridge
3. Bagging him and taking it away

fields.Title: Wash off the death smell
fields.Description: You reek of death. Wash it off. There's a bathtub in your room in the Whirling-in-Rags. A good place to visit once you can have some privacy.

fields.Title: DOOMED / MOODBOARD
fields.Description: Fortress Accident's whiteboard. Has three sections: game-related concept art, production schedule and Soona's notes.

fields.Title: DOOMED / RADIOCOMPUTER
fields.Description: RADIOCOMPUTER -- WIRRAL UNTETHERED! HEAT DEATH!

fields.Title: PIER / JOYCE INTRO
fields.Description:
Joyce is on her boat. She welcomes you and tells you about the situation, her role in it, what happened w hanged man.
1. Finishes task: find wild pines rep
2. Finishes task: reality lowdown
2. Gives task: investigate traffic jam
3. Volition white to get 130 real

fields.Title: PIER / JOYCE LYNCHING AND TATTOOS
fields.Description:
The lynching hub
The tattoos hub

fields.Title: Joyce's info on the lynching
fields.Description: There is something she wants to tell you -- you just have to present her with your badge to hear it. *Or* perhaps if you did her a favour she could wave off the formality? Whatever the case, you need to know what she knows.

fields.Title: The victim's tattoos
fields.Description: You have a photo of the hanged man's tattoos. Maybe someone can decipher them, tell you what they mean? You should probably talk to about two people about them for this.
fields.subtask_title_01: Ask around about tattoos' possible meaning.
fields.subtask_title_02: Ask another about the tattoos' possible meaning.

fields.Title: PIER / JOYCE ON EVRART
fields.Description: EVRART HUB and all such relevant information. Also tells you Discovery of Insulinde story.

fields.Title: PIER / JOYCE REALITY HUB
fields.Description: Reality hub

fields.Title: JOYCE / REALITY TIMES
fields.Description: Times part of hub, solves TASK.reality lowdown

fields.Title: Get Joyce to tell you about discovery of Insulinde
fields.Description: Joyce has said she will tell you about the discovery of the Insulindian isola, one day. You have a feeling you need to tell her things in return -- things you do for Evrart, maybe?

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / THE GARDENER MAIN
fields.Description: The Gardener turns out to be a Union fixer. Slightly different model and portrait. Short *smug* dialogue directing you to Hardie, referencing last dialogue.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / HARDIE
fields.Description:
Titus Hardie, leader of the militant union wing Hardie Boys. Mass dialogue + Gardener and Boys:

1) Admit they lynched the man because of a rape.
2) WHITE: Rhetoric to get them to tell you Klaasje was victim (Evrart makes easier -- leads to Klaasje, Klaasje betrays)
3) React to Klaasje's betrayal
4) WHITE: Suggestion to get them to counterbetray and reveal Assassination
5) something to get them to reveal Instigator (Ruby)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / HORSE FACED WOMAN
fields.Description: Horse-Faced-Woman (Minot)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / MAN WITH SUNGLASSES
fields.Description: Man with Sunglasses (Vicquemare)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / hidden door
fields.Description: There's a door there, partially obscured by posters.
fields.Placement: On the posters behind the stage in whirling downstairs

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / door conclusion
fields.Condition: Variable["whirling.steel_door_hub_reached"]  and  Variable["auto.visited_pinball_room"] == false  or  Variable["auto.visited_pinball_workshop"] == false
fields.Description: Could it lead to the same room as the kitchen door?
fields.Placement: around the stage, near hidden door orb

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / INDUSTRIAL STOVE
fields.Description: You can use the stove to boil the hanged man's boots when Kim is not around.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / door been there
fields.Description: It used to lead to the pinball repair shop.
fields.Placement: around the stage, near hidden door orb

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / SPARE WORKSHOP KEYS
fields.Condition: CheckItem("key_workshop_spare") == false  and  Variable["whirling.sense_hardie_window_clicked"]  and  Variable["TASK.enter_cavern_done"] == false  and  IsHourBetween(7, 22) == true
fields.Description: Somewhere in the room are the previous owner's spare keys to the pinball workshop (door in kitchen). This is the (perc check hidden) dialogue where you find them. (One path to hidden access to roof)1) Mis-connect to instigator because of room

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / bills on desk
fields.Description: Hotel bill calculations. Looks like she's had an extended stay.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / dirty clothes
fields.Description: Piles of dirty clothes; a woman's.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / sad feeling
fields.Description: This room has *Sad* all over it -- reminds you of your own

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / three months of bills
fields.Description: She's made around four months of payments for this room.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 / CLEAR WINDOW VISCAL DIFFICULT
fields.Description: This window has been recently replaced. High perception to notice. This dialogue gets a viscal and becomes trivial once someone admits Assassination
fields.Placement: the window on the right, in klaasje's room

fields.Title: WHIRLING ROOF ORB / astra menthol
fields.Description: The smell of cigarette smoke in the air: *Astra* Menthol.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 / BARRED DOOR
fields.OverrideDialogueCondition: Variable["whirling.barreddoor_got_open"] == true  or  Variable["whirling.barreddoor_opened_from_the_inside"] == true  or Variable["whirling.barreddoor_physinst_kick_in_success"] == true
fields.Description:
This is the door on the roof. 
Phys Inst white get in

fields.Title: WHIRLING ROOF ORB / wildflowers
fields.Description: Look! A handful of dried white wildflowers...

fields.Title: WHIRLING ROOF ORB / handeye catch
fields.Description: hand eye coordination bubble to catch the wildflowers

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / bed
fields.Description: The bed has been hastily made.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / ELEVATOR
fields.Description:
1. You experience the lovely elevator and wonder what it was used for.
2. You can go up and down.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / franconigerian conquest pinballer
fields.Description: This pinball says 'Franconigerian'. The theme is horses and swords.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / mysterious woman pinballer
fields.Description: This pinball is 'White Deora'. The backglass shows a female figure in mourning.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / play pinball
fields.Condition: Variable["whirling.hidden_pinball_franconigerian"] == true  and  Variable["whirling.hidden_pinball_tip"] == true  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["whirling.orb_pinball_interfacing_done"] == false
fields.Description:
1. Let's play pinball.
2. Kim "Pinball" Kitsuragi back story.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / tools
fields.Description: Boxes of tools and replacement parts line the shelves.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / peephole shivers
fields.Condition: Variable["auto.in_whirling_walls"] == true  and  Variable["whirling.workshop_seen_perforation"] == true  and  Variable["whirling.orb_peephole_shivers_done"] == false  and  (Variable["whirling.klaasje_lovers"] == true  or  Variable["whirling.klaasje_sex_with_lely"] == true)  and  Variable["whirling.peephole_electrochem_done"] == false
fields.Description:
1. Doomed felt.
2. This is not just a hole -- this is a peephole.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / small perforation
fields.Description: There's a tiny hole in the wall. You see a bedroom on the other side.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / pinball workshop
fields.Condition: Variable["auto.in_whirling_walls"] == true  and  Variable["whirling.workshop_tools"] == true  and  Variable["whirling.workshop_machine"] == true  and  Variable["whirling.workshop_boxes"] == true  and  Variable["whirling.orb_pinball_mystery_done"] == false
fields.Description:
1. This was a pinball workshop.
2. Was the Whirling-in-Rags part of the doomed commercial area task gained.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 / FOOTPRINTS IN THE DUST
fields.Description:
1. See tracks from what seem to be boots.
2. Reveals not odd-soled if you return after suspecting Ruby. (Anti-red-herring.)

fields.Title: Send victim's body to processing
fields.Description: Once you're done with it, send the corpse to Processing (Lieutenant Kitsuragi will take care of it). Check twice to see whether you're done with all corpse-related tasks -- after you've sent the body away, you can't take it back.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / body down
fields.Description: In the yard below a corpse lies under the pine tree.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / body up
fields.Description: In the yard below a corpse hangs from the pine tree.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / body gone
fields.Description: You see the yard below. The corpse is no longer there.

fields.Title: Find speed and sniff it
fields.Description: The hangover is coming on *mega* strong now. You need more speed in your bloodstream. Find some, put it in your hand (equip it in the HELD slot in your INVENTORY), and off we go!

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 / CLEAR WINDOW VISCAL TRIVIAL
fields.Description: The trivial version of the window -- for when you know about Assassination
fields.Placement: the window on the right, in klaasje's room

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / watching you
fields.Condition: Variable["auto.near_klaasje_bed"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.arrest_klaasje_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.report_to_the_tribunal_done"] == false
fields.Description: You feel someone watching you, behind the glass door -- a woman.

fields.Title: WHIRLING ROOF ORB / wind picks them up
fields.Description: ...the wind brushes them off the roof. They're gone.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 / KLAASJE RAPE VOLITION
fields.Description:
3) What happened? (rape)
4) Volition white (manipulating you)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 / KLAASJE TAPE LELY
fields.Description:
5) heard tape / gonna hear tape
6) Lely details

fields.Title: Who made the call reporting the crime?
fields.Description: Someone reported the hanging to the RCM. Maybe if you find out who it was, it may shed new light on the events. You have an idea where to start, but the caller could have been anyone.
fields.subtask_title_01: Call Sylvie using Kim's shortwave to ask whether she made the call.
fields.subtask_title_02: Keep searching for the caller -- despite lacking any obvious leads. (This might take some time)

fields.Title: Ask Klaasje about Sunday night
fields.Description: When Kim's not around to stop you, ask Klaasje about what she heard from her room the night before you emerged into Reality. She must know something.

fields.Title: Explore the Whirling’s secret passages
fields.Description: There are strange doors in the Whirling. No one knows where they lead. Find a way in and see what's hidden there, in the hostel cafeteria's forgotten corners.
fields.subtask_title_01: Find a way into the secret passage.
fields.subtask_title_02: Uncover the secrets hidden within.

fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / KLAASJE REACTION
fields.Description: Kim reacts to you losing your shit (Composure fail) when the Hardie boys said the victim is a young woman called Klaasje in the Whirling-in-Rags.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 / KLAASJE barks
fields.Description: KOSMOS! INCLUDES VO!

fields.Title: Sing karaoke
fields.Description: You need to find a sufficiently tragic tape, then play it on a boombox to memorize the lyrics. Then ask the cafeteria manager to perform. (Preferably in the evening. More people at the bar then.)
fields.subtask_title_01: Get hold of a sad song on tape.
fields.subtask_title_02: Convince Garte to let you sing karaoke.
fields.subtask_title_03: Get up on the stage in the evening.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / narcomania afterthought
fields.Description: narcomania afterthought
fields.Placement: around klaasje on whirling roof (klaasje afterthought)

fields.Title: INVENTORY / DRIED MAY BELLS
fields.Description: This dialogue is attached to the "dried_may_bells" item.

fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / DISCUSSING KLAASJE DOWNSTAIRS
fields.Description: this should blink ONLY DOWNSTAIRS and after Klaasje rape hub exit

fields.Title: INVENTORY / LELY TAPE
fields.Description: tape now interactable in inventory, if you have the boombox. Lely-Kortenaer banter for interrogate Klaasje sequence

fields.Title: Doorgunner Megamix
fields.Description: Hardie gave you a recording where the hanged man supposedly testifies to his intent to rape and pillage. Have a listen on a playback device -- either in your room; or find one from a pawnshop.
fields.subtask_title_01: Listen to the Doorgunner Megamix.
fields.subtask_title_02: Talk to Klaasje about the Doorgunner Megamix.
fields.subtask_title_03: Talk to Titus about the Doorgunner Megamix.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 / KLAASJE FULL STORY
fields.Description:
6) hardie confessed, whole story (ruby leader)
7) drama white (ruby suspect)

fields.Title: Question Klaasje about the dead man
fields.Description: Klaasje told you she can't talk about him now, but you need *specifics* -- height, build, etc, to confirm your autopsy. Ask a little later, when she has collected herself.
fields.subtask_title_01: Return to Klaasje after doing the autopsy, ask her again about the hanged man.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / age afterthought
fields.Description: how old are you afterthought
fields.Placement: on the rooftop, on top of whirling in rags, around klaasje (its her dialogue afdterthough)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 / KLAASJE END
fields.Description: 11) Shivers white

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / love did him in
fields.Description: did in by love afterthought
fields.Placement: on the whirling roof around klaasje and everywhere

fields.Title: Make Titus give up Ruby's location
fields.Description: Ruby was the organizer of the hanging. She's also *missing*, but the Hardie boys will be tight-lipped about her location. You need to get them to open up. Have you *fully* explored the Whirling? Analysed the site of the murder? Truly and *thoroughly* interrogated Klaasje? All this might make convincing them easier.
fields.subtask_title_01: Titus doesn't believe Ruby shot the hanged man. Present a theory, make him see it's something to consider.

fields.Title: Inspect Klaasje's buoy
fields.Description: There's a buoy West of the boardwalk on the coast, somewhere in the reeds. It has Miss Oranje's fake documents in it...

fields.Title: LANDS END ORB / cigarette butts
fields.Description: Cigarette butts, cleaned away under a rock: brand Tioumoutiri.

fields.Title: LANDS END ORB / rickety ladder
fields.Description: This ladder is too rusty to climb. The sea air has eaten away at it.

fields.Title: LANDS END ORB / campfire remains
fields.Description: Someone's made a campfire here, a long time ago.

fields.Title: LANDS END ORB / lands end shot viscal
fields.Condition: Variable["TASK.check_lands_end_cancelled"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.check_lands_end"]  and  Variable["coast.sense_perc_campfire_remains"]  and  Variable["coast.sense_perc_latter_on_tower"]  and  Variable["coast.orb_lands_end_shot_done"] == false
fields.Description: the conclusion dialogue where you conclude the shot did not come from land's end. this fires only if you have  TASK.check_lands_end

fields.Title: Arrest Klaasje
fields.Description: There is a hidden way to arrest Klaasje and have Kim take her to Precinct 57 for safe keeping. She is not to be trusted.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / red thread inside
fields.Description: A red thread. Made of nylon. It leads out of the room and onto the roof...

fields.Title: WHIRLING ROOF ORB / red thread outside if did not click on thread inside
fields.Description: Red thread. Made of nylon. It leads into the room...

fields.Title: WHIRLING ROOF ORB / red thread outside if clicked on thread inside
fields.Description: The thread is tied to the antenna.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / red thread inside if clicked on thread outside
fields.Description: The thread is tied to a bookcase on the wall.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / KIM WAKEUP
fields.Description: If you succeeded the final Authority check to warn Kim.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / CUNO WAKEUP
fields.Description: If you didn't make the authority check.

fields.Title: Find solution to strike deadlock
fields.Description: There is a secret way to solve the deadlock. It's not easy, includes a lot of back and forth between the two sides, but it's possible. Everything is always possible.

fields.Title: Are you La Puta Madre's peone?
fields.Description: Ruby said you were a notoriously corrupt cop. La Puta Madre's peone. That's why she was scared of you. When you get the chance, call your station to find out more -- *if* you dare.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / fixed window
fields.Description: Newly replaced glass, shining in the morning light.
fields.Placement: in the whirling room, on thw window that used to be broken (shows up when rtoom cleaned)

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / fixed stereo 8
fields.Description: This Stereo 8 player has been reunited with its right speaker.
fields.Placement: on the stereo 8 player in the fixed up room after fight

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / fixed bathtub
fields.Description: You see gleaming white enamel. No bottles inside...
fields.Placement: on the empty bathtub in fixed room after fight

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / traffic outside
fields.Description: You hear traffic outside. Back in the world again...

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / unmade bed
fields.Description: The bed still smells of your sweat and blood.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / alarm clock
fields.Description: The alarm is set for 6:50 AM.
fields.Placement: on alarm clock in kim's room

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / kims room door open
fields.Description: Look! The door is open! You can walk right into Kim's room.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / KIM PAPERWORK
fields.Description: checking out some of kim's official paperwork on his room desk
fields.Placement: on the table, the outline around some papers on the table in kim's room

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / first aid
fields.Description: Medicinal supplies on the cupboard: Merchurochrome, a scalpel, antibiotics...
fields.Placement: on cupboard in kim's room (the artists had a jira task to add medical supply looking stuff there, on the cupboard) the orb is on those

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / KLAASJE'S NOTE
fields.Description: She's left you a note on her table

fields.Title: PLAZA / GRAFFITO
fields.Description:
There's a giant graffito on the plaza outside:
Un jour je serai de retour près de toi

fields.Title: Light the graffito on fire with a burning cigarette
fields.Description: What it says on the can.

fields.Title: Ask Lilienne's twins about the island
fields.Description: Lilienne mentioned they might have been there on a raft -- the twins are on the concrete yard in the middle of the village.

fields.Title: VILLAGE / LILIENNES TWINS
fields.Description: You can talk to them before and get nothing, but when you hear the twins have been to the island they tell you details about it.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / ancient stairs
fields.Description: These stairs feel ancient... soldier's feet ran up them long ago.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / quiet on the island
fields.Description: (afterthought on silence and sounds)
fields.Placement: island, two meters right of pine tree in sector 1

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / leaky barrel
fields.Description: Some fuel has leaked out of the barrel. Black, viscous.
fields.Placement: in sector one, up the stairs, leaking oil barrow under shed -- on leak on the ground

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / warm air
fields.Description: Warm air -- from the inside of the building. It's warmer there than out here.
fields.Placement: sectro one, near tower entrance, west of door, when standing very near to the hole in the building

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / chain winch one
fields.Description: The rusted chain trails off into the ocean...
fields.Placement: on the chain in the entrance, where the boat lands

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / chain afterthought
fields.Condition: Variable["seafort.orb_chain_winch_clicked"] == true  and  (Variable["coast.depot_chain_clicked"]  or  Variable["coast.depot_door_unopenable_hub_reached"])  and  Variable["seafort.orb_chain_winch_done"] == false
fields.Description: (afterthought about chain)
fields.Placement: around chain winch one orb (its afterthought)

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / barrel ICM logo
fields.Description: This barrel says: ICM. You see a star with little specks in it.
fields.Placement: near the door, on the barell lying on its side

fields.Title: LANDS END ORB / depot chain
fields.Description: The chain trails off into the ocean -- to who knows where.

fields.Title: LANDS END / DEPOT DOOR
fields.Description: The door to the jammed supply depot near Land's End. The door is jammed and locked. You can't open it. EVER.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / vertigo
fields.Description: Be careful not to fall... the cliff face looks steep.
fields.Placement: sector one, metre left to barells near door, when standing on the edge of the cliff, right on the edge

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / birch empathy
fields.Description: The little birch from the coin operated viewer. Still holding on.
fields.Placement: sector 1, east of the door, on the little birch tree there

fields.Title: Find fuel for the generator
fields.Description: Find fuel, then put it in the generator upstairs (to power the console -- to open the door). There could be fuel on the island, tucked away somewhere -- explore, look around.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / leaky barrel empty
fields.Description: This barrel has run empty. There's almost nothing inside.
fields.Placement: in sector one, up the stairs, leaking oil barrow under shed -- on the barrel itself

fields.Title: SEAFORT / KIM FUEL barks
fields.Description: Kim reacts to fuel empty if task is on w/ BARK

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / birch normal
fields.Description: You recognize this little birch. From the coin-operated viewer.
fields.Placement: sector 1, east of the door, on the little birch tree there -- exact same spot as "birch empathy" (these rule each other out)

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / ICM logo questions
fields.Description: (afterthought on ICM)

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / armament rest
fields.Description: This was once an armament rest.

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT / MICROGRID GENERATOR
fields.Description: (generator, rewired – insert fuel here (use controls to activate electricity and open door if fuel in). kim remarks on wiring.)

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT / SPRING MATTRESS
fields.Description: (mattress interactable) (this is where you sleep)

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / reading lamp off
fields.Description: This reading lamp is unpowered.

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT / READING MATERIALS
fields.Description: bookshelf with critical theory (communist books) under gun

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT / BLAST DOOR
fields.Description: blast door interactable dialogue. (this is closed, no way to open, open from console if has fuel in)

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / stairs collapsed
fields.Description: Careful. These stairs have collapsed.

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT / FELD INSULAR CONSOLE
fields.Description: old electronic console – turn on lights and open blast door if fuel in generator

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / downstairs
fields.Description: Canned food, sugar, and other foodstuffs.

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / cannon
fields.Description: Twin cannons were attached here. Medium distance, large calibre.

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / reading lamp on
fields.Description: The reading lamp emits a soft glow.
fields.Placement: on the reading lamp in flak tower

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / squadron flag
fields.Description: A moth-bitten bed sheet keeps the wind out.
fields.Placement: on the flag in flak tower, near slit, above sleeping mattress

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / ligature blood drip
fields.Description: Warm blood trickles down your armpit. The ligature is off... it's *nothing*.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / PAYS INFERNAL
fields.Description: you can read the book (MAYBE)

fields.Title: SEAFORT / MATTRESS NEST
fields.Description: (in front of double embrasure looking over the bay, into whirling window, ends check island task, shot was made here)

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / cargo ship horn
fields.Description: The distant sound of cargo ships... Signal horns echo on the water.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / inland eyes
fields.Description: You feel eyes on your back. Someone's watching, but you can't say where...

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / broken winch
fields.Description: The winch is broken, rust has eaten what remains of the chain.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / winch depot
fields.Description: The depot that supplied this chain is long gone from the coast.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / walk into water
fields.Description: (walk into water dialogue, foreshadowing for dream)

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / map table
fields.Description: A weathered artillery map showing coordinates in the Bay of Revachol.

fields.Title: LANDS END ORB / cigarette mental note
fields.Description: You take a mental note: Tioumoutiri. Seems important somehow.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / bleuets
fields.Description: Small white maybells, blossoming in the sand.

fields.Title: SEAFORT / THE DESERTER
fields.Description:
Meet the Deserter, gun in hand, by the extinguished fire. 

AUTHORITY  (PSYCHE) red check

fields.Title: SEAFORT / INSULINDIAN PHASMID
fields.Description: Interact with the Insulindian phasmid.

fields.Title: SEAFORT DREAM ORB / door is unopened
fields.Description: The door is back, like you never opened it...
fields.Placement: dream seafort island map , flak tower, closed blast door

fields.Title: SEAFORT DREAM ORB / door is still here
fields.Description: The door is still here, closed. Feels strange somehow. You can't get in.
fields.Placement: dream seafort island map , flak tower, closed blast door

fields.Title: SEAFORT DREAM ORB / step into water
fields.Description: Walk into the water. Now.
fields.Placement: dream seafort island map, sector 2, near the wince, same place "walk into water" orb

fields.Title: SEAFORT DREAM ORB / really step into water
fields.Description: Now do it -- walk into the *water*.
fields.Placement: dream seafort island map, sector 2, near the wince, same place "walk into water" orb

fields.Title: DREAM SEAFORT / DOLORES DEI
fields.Description: She's crossing the street in the water. Click on her

fields.Title: DREAM SEAFORT / NO DOLORES DREAM
fields.Description: This is the consolation dream if you did not get to see stained glass window inside church

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT / AFTERDOLORES TALK
fields.Description: Load to this from dream seafort dolores dei dialogue end.

fields.Title: What is the Race Enigma?
fields.Description: Put the Advanced Race Theory idea into a free *internalizing* slot in your head. (If there are no free slots, free one up). Then pass some time and when it's internalized, return to Measurehead. This is how thinking is done!

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / dialogue both shoes
fields.Description: both shoes on, finishes task

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / trompe le monde afterthought
fields.Description: Nothing on the front page rings a bell. Strange...

fields.Title: YARD ORB / dialogue door strange feeling
fields.Description: The sound of melting snow dripping off the roof... it's strange.
fields.Placement: in the back of the yard, near pile of eternite door to cuno's shacxk

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / wheelbarrow
fields.Description: A heap of snow melts in this wheelbarrow.
fields.Placement: on the gardener's wheelbarrow, most likely

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / BACK DOOR
fields.Description: It's the back door of "Crime, Romance, and Biographies of Famous People". You can look at it, use a key object on it or try to force it open.

fields.Title: PLAZA / COUPRIS KINEEMA
fields.Description:
Lieutenant Kitsuragi's Coupris Kineema. With the built in shortwave radio and a trunk full of goodies, here lies the answer to the question that's been bothering you - what tore me from the soft abyss this morning.

* Gain item: Crowbar
* Gain item: bodybags
* Gain item: Chaincutters
* Gain item: Fire extinguisher
* Gain secret task: Cut something.
* Gain task: Get a Primer-book.

fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / TWINS AND RADIO
fields.Description: Fires after you've heard the Twins testimony with Kim. He reveals he knows the station. Weird if true, worth giving them a call.

fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / SPOKE TO SPEEDFREAKS
fields.Description: Speedfreaks FM confirmed that the kids heard the Speedfreaks. He doesn't know what that means or how it relates to your case, but suggests you go back to the FELD Mural.

fields.Title: Work with the Children of the Big Sea
fields.Description: The Wind spoke to you at the Feld Mural. The Children of the Big Sea know something that will assist you in finding Ruby. But who are the Children and what do they know?
fields.subtask_title_01: Find the Children of the Big Sea.
fields.subtask_title_02: Speak to Lilienne's Twins again with Kim present.
fields.subtask_title_03: Call Speedfreaks FM from the lieutenant's Kineema.
fields.subtask_title_04: Ask Lilienne's Twins where they were when they heard Speedfreaks FM.
fields.subtask_title_05: Put the pieces together at the Feld Mural.
fields.subtask_title_06: Ask the Washerwoman if she's heard the radio lately.
fields.subtask_title_07: Ask the Washerwoman about the radio -- with Kim.

fields.Title: KINEEMA / STATION CALL
fields.Description:
Your first contact with the colleagues back in station 41.

* Report your badge missing
* Report your gun missing
* Get laughed at
* Beg your station for additional funds
* Get a panic attack
* Get an aweseome Firewalker persona
* Get the "Find your badge" quest
* Get the "Find your gun" quest.
* Get the "Check the local pawnshops" quest.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / CLOAK JUMP
fields.Description: You see a policeman-cloak -- jump to it. Get it. If you're above, to be precise! Otherwise, you can just pick it up or whatever.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / crane
fields.Description: You see faded industrial lettering on the platform: KVALSUND.

fields.Title: OFFICE / FILE CABINET
fields.Description: THE FILE CABINET DIALOGUE

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART FAVORS
fields.Description: "You seem to be very helpful, I got a favour to ask."

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART ME
fields.Description: "You seem to know thing about me... Can I ask you about something?"

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART MR DU BOIS
fields.Description: "You called, me *Mr. Du Bois*, why?"

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART HOW I GOT HERE
fields.Description: "Aren't you going to ask me how I got in here?"

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART GUN
fields.Description:
"Let's talk about my lost gun."
&
"Can I have my lost gun now?"

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART UNION
fields.Description: "I wanna discuss some matters regarding the union with you."

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART MURDER
fields.Description: "I wanna talk to you about the murder."

fields.Title: Open apartment door for Evrart
fields.Description: Evrart asked you to open the basement door behind the greenhouse in the backyard, to intimidate the occupant. Do what you have to do, Evrart has promised to give you info on the case in return.
fields.subtask_title_01: Get the key to the weasel's door from Mañana.
fields.subtask_title_02: You have the key. The door is behind the greenhouse in the yard. A basement door.
fields.subtask_title_03: *Or* you can lie to Evrart that you opened the weasel's door.
fields.subtask_title_04: Let Evrart know you unlocked the door.

fields.Title: Get two signatures for Evrart
fields.Description: Get Isobel and Lilienne in the nameless fishing village down the coast to sign Evrart's document. Once the signatures are secured, mail the document to Evrart's accountant using the mail box on the plaza in front of the Whirling.
fields.subtask_title_01: Find someone to sign the document instead the intended signees.
fields.subtask_title_02: Put the envelope in the mailbox in the plaza.
fields.subtask_title_03: Forge the signatures, but somewhere private, where you feel safe enough to sleep.
fields.subtask_title_04: Let Evrart know you mailed the signatures.

fields.Title: Turn back the wheels of time
fields.Description: A true kingsman *cannot* stomach the grotesque parody of Old Revachol your home has become. *Assez*! Find a way to turn back time, save the Suzerainty and give *love* a second chance.
fields.subtask_title_01: Ask the local 'traditionalists' if anyone knows how to turn back time.
fields.subtask_title_02: Return to Measurehead once you understand the basics of 'reality'.
fields.subtask_title_03: Your quest to figure out 'reality' has failed. Return to Measurehead.
fields.subtask_title_04: Figure out what's going on with the white-haired lorry driver.
fields.subtask_title_05: Face yourself in the mirror -- alone.

fields.Title: APT / WRITING DESK IN CUNO'S APT
fields.Description:
2 bottles of speed on the table, in plain sight. A straw in the bottle. Low-quality trucker speed. Drugs have charges, this is a low-charge one. 0 bonus to your electrochem base-count of how many times you can use the drug.

FIND THE SPEED finishes when you click on the table. While you're taking that shit, Kim is already checking the other room. Kitsuragi love goes down if you take the drugs.

Table diag despaws after you've taken the drugs.

Habit-initiation dialogue. Electrochem tells you blast one already in this dialogue. Ask Argo (abt cigarette initiation dial). It should also teach you to put it in your hold slot. 

Global afterthought, electrochem pops up

fields.Title: PIER / CINDY

fields.Title: INVENTORY / FRACTURED BULLET
fields.Description:
By inspecting the bullet, you can find out that:
1. The bullet came from a breech-loaded rifle.
2. The bullet was shot from some distance, so this was probably not a mercy kill (white check.)
3. The rifle used was a model mass-produced during the revolutionary war, and the surplus rifles/ammo are still a favourite with third-world guerrillas and Jamrock bangers.

2. Come back the next day to get results and ask for Alice to try to get more personal info on the mercenary (finish task to run serial number, gain task to get personal info from serial number).
3. Come back the next day to get personal info (finish task to get personal info from serial number).

fields.Title: EVRART ORB / fishing rod
fields.Condition: Variable["tc.insulindian_phasmid"]  and  Variable["cargo.orb_fishing_rod_done"] == false  and  IsHourBetween(8, 21)
fields.Description: This is not a fishing rod, is it? It's...

fields.Title: LAIR / INSTIGATORS TENT
fields.Description:
1. Find Ruby's journal here.
2. Use to stow away Ruby's body if she killed herself.

fields.Title: LAIR / INSTIGATOR
fields.Description:
You are caught in the ray of the Pale Compressor and talk to Ruby. You can:
1. Ask about the Compressor.
2. Ask about the murder and why Ruby went into hiding.
3. Try to destroy the Compressor.
4. Try to stop Ruby from killing herself if you destroy the Compressor.
5. Let Ruby go.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / beware inland empire
fields.Description: There's something in the air, an unnatural buzzing.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / beware shivers
fields.Condition: Variable["boardwalk.orb_shivers_warning_done"] == false  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["TASK.enter_cavern_done"] == false
fields.Description: A dialogue with Pain Threshold foreshadowing end game.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK / FELD MURAL
fields.Description:
1. Observe the mural.
2. Shivers White Check to see stairs, which then allows you to use the ladder to get to the roof.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK / LADDER
fields.Description: Savoir Faire White Check to climb up.

fields.Title: LAIR / KIM DOOR barks
fields.Description: Kim wants you to let him in.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / shelves
fields.Description: Old file folders in the cart, documents silvery with mould.

fields.Title: LAIR / KRAS MAZOV PORTRAIT
fields.Description:
This portrait is covered in cobwebs. You can:
1. Compare to weapons cache.
2. Learn about Mazov.
3. React depending on political persuasion.
4. Speculate about who may have stayed here (foreshadows deserter).

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / bunker pamphlets
fields.Description: Revolutionary propaganda on the bunk bed: ancient flyers and brochures.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / bunker bunk bed
fields.Description: Stale fabric smell and dust. No one's slept here in months, maybe years.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / footprints
fields.Description: Boot prints in the sand. One of the soles appears more worn than the other.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK ORB / littered paper
fields.Description: Just some old invoices -- everything valuable was looted long ago.
fields.Placement:
Area: inside the FELD building, somewhere on the ground, for example. Or whatever seems like it could be a random jumble of old invoices and other paper crap.
Details:

fields.Title: BOARDWALK ORB / broken glass
fields.Description: The glass is covered with grime and dust. You can barely see out.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / slit window
fields.Description: You can see the beach through this slit window.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / shot viscal
fields.Condition: Variable["TASK.check_boardwalk_cancelled"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.check_boardwalk"]  and  Variable["boardwalk.bunker_pamphlets"]  and  Variable["boardwalk.feld_slit_window_seen_inside"]  and  Variable["boardwalk.orb_where_shot_came_viscal_done"] == false
fields.Description: You decide that the shot that killed the merc couldn't have come from this bunker.

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / slit window 2
fields.Description: The same slit window you saw from the outside.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / RUBY'S JOURNAL
fields.Description: Here you can learn about Ruby's involvement with La Puta Madre.

fields.Title: LAIR / INSTIGATOR CASE
fields.Description: Here you can present your case to Ruby and find yourself left without much of a case.

fields.Title: LIFELINE / HEART ATTACK
fields.Description: When you lose enough Health (Endurance), you have a heart attack. This is the freebie/tutorial.

fields.Title: LIFELINE / GIVING UP
fields.Description: When you lose enough Morale (Volition), you feel like giving up. This is the freebie/tutorial.

fields.Title: GARYS APARTMENT / DOOR
fields.Description: You can open this door when you get the key from Manana.

fields.Title: SHACK ORB / locust city
fields.Description: It's crawling with locusts in here!

fields.Title: SHACK ORB / locust city logic
fields.Description: Cuno must have taken the locusts from the trap. Get task to confront him.

fields.Title: Return Lena's pin
fields.Description: Lena gave you a commemorative pin to pawn when you were desperate for cash. The *honourable* thing to do would be to return it to her -- buy it back and return it to her once you have money.

fields.Title: Pay Lena back for pin
fields.Description: Lena gave you a commemorative pin to pawn when you were desperate for cash. You could pay her back once your financial situation isn't quite as pitiful. Finished when you give Lena what the pawnbroker paid you for the pin.

fields.Title: Get a reality lowdown
fields.Description: You have no idea where you are. Lena encouraged you to ask others to explain the world to you in greater detail -- perhaps try a rich person? Rich people are educated.
fields.subtask_title_01: Joyce is rich *and* willing to answer your questions. Ask one!
fields.subtask_title_02: Keep asking Joyce questions about reality -- or return later. She'll be here whenever you need the info.

fields.Title: JAM / COALITION WARSHIP ARCHER -- SOONA VERSION
fields.Description: CUTSCENE where you attempt to contact Coalition Warship Archer with SOONA. PART OF THE MORALIST DREAM QUEST

fields.Title: PLAZA / PISSFLAUBERT AND FTW
fields.Description: Near Kineema, two young gentlemen wishing to introduce Martinaise to the SKULLS brand are idling away, looking at the beast of a motor carriage. It is possible to get their jackets if you succeed the red check.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / RICH GUY CONTAINER DOOR
fields.Description: Here be the container door with which you converse good Sir, getting rhetorical awards you the ability to *drum-roll* enter the container!

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD / LIGHT BENDING GUY
fields.Description: Dialogue with a man so rich that light literally bends around his face.

fields.Title: CHURCH / STAINED GLASS WINDOW VISCAL
fields.Description: Viscal concerning the stained glass window. You can put important things together.

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / slipstreamblades
fields.Description: Steel rotor blades bearing a "Slipstream" logo.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE / PARANORMAL
fields.Description: Shelf of paranormal books.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / balconythought
fields.Description: Must be Jan Kaus again.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / fuckoffafterthought
fields.Description: Afterthought dialogue if you told the lorry driver to fuck off.

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / conceptstream
fields.Condition: Variable["doomed.seen_blades"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.seen_skis"] == true  and  Variable["doomed.orb_slipstream_thought_done"] == false
fields.Description: Slipstream conceptualizing

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / taxidermy
fields.Description: Wild animals stare at you in the dark, stuffed and mounted.

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / mannequin
fields.Description: A naked mannequin torso. A strange yellow colour.

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 ORB / windowslogic
fields.Description: Looks like the remains of the "24h Window" repair shop.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / summerdoor
fields.Description: Summer door closed for the winter.

fields.Title: WHIRLING / MONEYMAN barks
fields.Description: A wildly succesful barking moneyman exclaims lots of comments about money.

fields.Title: DOOMED F2 / BACK DOOR
fields.Description: It's the back door of "Crime, Romance, and Biographies of Famous People", if you come from THE OTHER SIDE, from inside the Doomed Commercial Area.

fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / LORRY CONCLUSIONS
fields.Description: A post-lorry-search dialogue with Kim, going over the necessary information and coming to some conclusions.

fields.Title: ICE / ACELE AND ASSOCIATES
fields.Description: this is where the "ask about acele's associates" and "what's your name" branches are located.

fields.Title: ICE / ACELE ON ICE
fields.Description: this is where the "recording device", "what are you doing here on the ice?" and "questioning" branches are located.

fields.Title: ICE / ACELE CHURCH STUFF
fields.Description: this is where "the drug lab plan conclusion", "what did you see in the church" and "what's your plan for the church" branches are located

fields.Title: Help ravers start a nightclub
fields.Description: The ravers asked you to help turn the church into a dance club, but there are already some people inside. Find out who those people are and what they want.
fields.subtask_title_01: Look into the spookers in the church.
fields.subtask_title_02: Ask Soona how she feels about the night club idea.
fields.subtask_title_03: Tell Andre about Soona's thoughts on the nightclub.
fields.subtask_title_04: Convince Soona to cooperate with the ravers, or evict her.
fields.subtask_title_05: You promised to help Soona with her project before the ravers can move in.
fields.subtask_title_06: Report back to Andre that they can move in.
fields.subtask_title_07: Visit the nightclub after ravers have moved in.

fields.Title: ICE / ANDRE TENT CONTENT
fields.Description: this is where andre's dialogues about the "church/padlock", "who are inside the church" and "tent equipment" are.

fields.Title: ICE / ANDRE WHITE CHECKS
fields.Description: this is where andre's two white checks are -- "try to logic and figure out what they're hiding/planning" and "JUST DANCE"

fields.Title: YARD / CUNODOOR
fields.Description: it's the door to Cuno's shack (an empty interactable node to get it working programming-wise)

fields.Title: Sync the sines with Noid
fields.Description: Noid doesn't want to talk to you, the sines are not in sync. Guess you need to help him and his friends out somehow, prove that you're one of the crew. Who knows what he'll tell you?

fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / FIGHT FAILURE
fields.Description: Kim's reaction to You trying to punch Measurehead and failing at it.

fields.Title: Solve the Egg Head puzzle
fields.Description: There has to be some way to talk to this person, you just haven't found it yet. (It's definitely not about sines.) What if you just try again, find your way out of this maze of things to say?

fields.Title: CANAL / HAWTHORN
fields.Description: The hawthorn tree on Rue de Saint-Ghislaine. A reel of bronze magnetic tape is caught in its branches. It's a part of Egg Head's "make the music harder core" task. Interfacing White Check to get it.
fields.Placement:
Area: Plaza area, near canal?
Details: A tree on Rue de Saint-Gislaine with a reel of bronze magnetic tape is caught in it's branches.

fields.Title: Confront Hardie boys about drug trade
fields.Description: A person present at the lynching is also involved with the drug trade through the harbour, which links them to Hardie's boys. See what Titus has to say about it.

fields.Title: Get Acele to talk about her associates
fields.Description: Acele refused to talk about her friends. Maybe she'll open up later -- after you've helped them set up the nightclub.

fields.Title: ICE / KIM POST TENT barks
fields.Description: Kim barks after you have RETURNETH from the TENT.

fields.Title: ICE / KIM CHURCH barks
fields.Description: Kim reacts to the church getting shot up by the police a few months ago. Creates question option in Kim Main Dialogue.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / shards of dei
fields.Description: A cracked pane of glass, colourful.
fields.Instruction:
SetVariableValue("church.orb_shards_clicked", true) ;
Afterthought("CHURCH ORB / shards viscal")--[[ Variable[ ]]
fields.Placement:
Area: back end of church near the wall, where the drug lab us
Details:

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / shards viscal
fields.Description: It came from the stained glass window. Still has letters on it too...

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / waterbasin afterthought
fields.Description: Could these wires work as contact microphones?

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / cone of silence
fields.Description: EVERYTHING IS SILENT HERE VERY SPOOKY SCENE YES INDEED WHOLE SCENE ABOUT LOOKING UP AND THEN TIAGO APPEARS, BOOM!
fields.Placement:
Area: in the middle of the waterbowls
Details:

fields.Title: VILLAGE / IDIOT DOOM SPIRAL
fields.Description: Idiot Doom Spiral Guy welcomes the return of Tequila Sunset! Tells the story of how you drove the car into the sea and drank with these drunks, and other tales of everything (in exchange of alcohol): cocaine skull, headless falnrider etc.

fields.Title: HQ ORB / orc heater
fields.Description: This intricate heat engine hums quietly, giving out pleasant warmth.

fields.Title: HQ ORB / new home shivers
fields.Condition: Variable["village.hq_clicked_orb_creak"]  and  Variable["village.hq_clicked_orb_orc"]  and  Variable["village.hq_clicked_orb_shelf"]  and  Variable["village.hq_orb_shivers_done"] == false
fields.Description: A shivers afterthought appears after you've clicked through the other orbs available inside the shack. It's a discussion of how it feels to have a new centre of operations, a free home

fields.Title: HQ ORB / wallstuff
fields.Description: Old science fiction magazines. Books about birdwatching. An almanac from '39.

fields.Title: HQ ORB / heater ency thought
fields.Description: Using a thermodynamic expander-condenser cycle... nice.

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / inland rockwell
fields.Description: Feels like there's someone above you, watching you from the dark.

fields.Title: NETHOUSE ORB / home smell
fields.Description: A faint scent of cinnamon still lingers in the air.

fields.Title: NETHOUSE ORB / fireplace
fields.Description: Industrial coal pellets burn with an orange glow.

fields.Title: NETHOUSE ORB / fireplace phasmid
fields.Description: You think the fire iron is a phasmid.

fields.Title: VILLAGE / LITTLE LILY
fields.Description: One of Netpicker's kids not running around in the village, instead she sits on the sofa. You can exchange a few words with her.

fields.Title: VILLAGE / LILIENNES TWINS barks
fields.Description: Two of Netpicker's kids standing around in the village, shuffling on their feet, kicking rocks and yelling barks or somesuch.

fields.Title: VILLAGE ORB / rooftop
fields.Description: Words have been painted on the roof of the building.

fields.Title: VILLAGE ORB / aerograffito afterthought
fields.Description: Conceptualization afterthought about the words on the roof!

fields.Title: BOARDWALK / WCH
fields.Description: Dead working class husband who has fallen through the blanks and cut himself open and it's generally a very gruesome and sad death.

fields.Title: NETHOUSE ORB / home smell reaction
fields.Description: It feels safe and warm in here -- not like outside.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / COACH PHYSICAL INSTRUMENT
fields.Condition: Variable["plaza.rene_physint_said_throw"] == true  and  Variable["plaza.rene_failed_putshot_rc"] == true  and  Variable["character.coach_physint_thought_done"] == false
fields.Description: Physical Instrument is really adamant about yelling at you. something-something triggers the thought

fields.Title: Hardie and the Pigs
fields.Description: Ask Titus Hardie and his boys to take care of the Pigs -- the woman catatonic on the boardwalk. It's their district, their mess -- their responsibility.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK ORB / rotting lobster pots
fields.Description: The lingering stench of rotting lobster pots.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK ORB / gut slime
fields.Description: Dried-up gut-slime and fish scales coat the floorboards.

fields.Title: WALKWAY ORB / party scene afterthought
fields.Condition: Variable["cargo.cigarette_butt_orb"] == true  and  Variable["cargo.empty_bottles_orb"] == true  and  Variable["cargo.orb_sad_party_inland_done"] == false
fields.Description: Someone either had the most depressing solo-party... or there's a sequence killer on the loose.

fields.Title: Ask Evrart about Acele and the drug lab
fields.Description: Acele said Evrart is connected to the drug operation in the church. Maybe you can use this to manipulate him.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / HJELMDALLERMANN
fields.Description: Hjelmdallermann: the Man from Hjelmdall. A latter introductory book for beginners.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / DREAM 2 INTRO
fields.Description:
1. You try to get comfortable, but the bed is less than ideal.
2. You begin to drift off, but have trouble getting to sleep.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / DREAM 2 HANGED MAN
fields.Description:
1. You have a conversation with the hanged man dressed in your disco outfit.
2. You find out that you have failed Elysium.
THE CORRECT VERSION

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / speed hangover
fields.Condition: DayCount() == 2  and  Variable["whirling.elchem_orb_speed_hangover_done"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.get_speed_done"] == false
fields.Description: Electrochemistry informs you that you're low on amphetamines in your bloodstream.

fields.Title: DAYCHANGE / TEQUILA BED
fields.Description: The dialogue between You and your bed. You can sleep, not sleep, read your ledger.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / BLACKOUT DREAM
fields.Description: Dreamless sleep, finally!

fields.Title: SHACK ORB / magnesolam
fields.Description: An empty tube of *Magnesolam* magnesium supplement.

fields.Title: SHACK ORB / magnesolam encyclo
fields.Description: A magnesium supplement you rub on your chest to live a happy magnesium-rich life.

fields.Title: SHACK ORB / silverplate
fields.Description: A silver plate with traces of bone yellow powder.

fields.Title: SHACK ORB / poster get out
fields.Description: The poster says: GET OUT OF THE WAY -- OR GET FUCKED UP!

fields.Title: SHACK ORB / pighead
fields.Description: Cured pig's head. It looks mummified.

fields.Title: SHACK ORB / poster get out inland
fields.Description: That's actually a FALN slogan, from an aggressive youth oriented campaign.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / PALE MEDICINE
fields.Description: Medicinal Purposes of the Pale.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / MULLEN IDENTITY
fields.Description: "Dick Mullen and the Mistaken Identity". Dick Mullen is mistaken for someone (an identity).

fields.Title: INVENTORY / BAD ROMANCE
fields.Description: Excrutiating Love Story book. Graad-y black-and-white-rainbow book. Ends with lensgrinder in somewhere. "Sixteen Days in Coldest April." something thought it was a romance book, but its misplaced.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / SUZERAINTY GAME
fields.Description: Information about: colonies of Revachol.

fields.Title: GATES ORB / electroentrance
fields.Description: A hermetically sealed door. Locked by electronic means.

fields.Title: INITIATION / ALCOHOL HABIT
fields.Description: A thought for becoming an alcoholic.

fields.Title: INITIATION / PYRHOLIDON HABIT
fields.Description: A thought for becoming a wonderful pyrholidon addict.

fields.Title: INITIATION / SMOKING HABIT
fields.Description: Global afterthought dialogue to pick up smoking.

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / more bullet holes
fields.Description: Another splattering of bullet holes on this wall.
fields.Placement:
Area: wide wall in the backyard; west of the door to apartments, north from the door to gary's apartment.
Details:

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / water barrels
fields.Description: These barrels are half-full of rainwater.
fields.Placement: On the bunched together blue barrels in the east of the back yard

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / water tower
fields.Description: A rickety old water tower.
fields.Placement: on the side of the water tower in the east of the back yard, on the roof

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / more bullet thoughts
fields.Description: quick comments with kim or not about the other bullet holes in this wall.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / ART COP
fields.Description: Conceptualization is really interested in your Art Cop ideas

fields.Title: OFFICE ORB / strike fliers
fields.Description: "EVERY WORKER = MEMBER OF THE BOARD" is written at the top of the flyers.

fields.Title: OFFICE ORB / typewriter and lamp setup
fields.Description: This is a "Dewy" typewriter -- the model name is on the back.

fields.Title: OFFICE ORB / strike fliers logo
fields.Description: And at the bottom: the Union logo and "DEMAND DEMOCRACY"!

fields.Title: OFFICE ORB / couch2
fields.Description: Someone is habitually chilling next to the radio.

fields.Title: OFFICE ORB / couch
fields.Description: A giant assprint on the pillow and a pattern of coffee rings on the armrest...

fields.Title: OFFICE ORB / disconnected phone
fields.Description: A combination phone-and-punchclock setup.

fields.Title: OFFICE ORB / electroentrance other side
fields.Description: The door is locked and cannot be opened from this side without a pass card.

fields.Title: OFFICE ORB / locked door afterthought
fields.Condition: Variable["gates.orb_office_door_warning"] == true  and  CheckItem("union_membership_card") == false  and  CheckItem("union_membership_card_other") == false
fields.Description: Guess you have no choice but to talk to the Union leader.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / CODEX URIK
fields.Description: An introductory race creation and dweorg cultural backstory manual available to purchase in the board game mountain.

fields.Title: PLAZA / RENE PETANQUE
fields.Description: René pétanque-ball RC.

fields.Title: PLAZA / RENE CASE MONEY RAT
fields.Description: Asking about the case and discussing women.

fields.Title: PLAZA / RENE WC HERO STORY
fields.Description: Red check to impress René with a hero-story of your own.

fields.Title: PLAZA / GASTON CHEATING
fields.Description:
* Rat or don't rat out cheating Gaston
* What Game is this?

fields.Title: PLAZA / GASTON CASE
fields.Description: The Case

fields.Title: PLAZA / GASTON SANDWICH WC
fields.Description: Sandwich orgy

fields.Title: YARD / CUNO WHO IS CUNO
fields.Description:
* Who is Cuno?
* Make amends with Cuno.

fields.Title: YARD / CUNO BODY
fields.Description: * Ask Cuno about the hanged man.

fields.Title: YARD / CUNO FRIDGE
fields.Description: Ask if Cuno knows a place you could stash the dead body.

fields.Title: YARD / CUNO SCENE
fields.Description: * Ask Cuno about the yard.

fields.Title: Buy FALN pants from Cuno
fields.Description: Those FALN track pants looked enticing, but you and Cuno were not *close* yet. You need to figure out what's going on with him and then you can get your hands on some performance gear.

fields.Title: Get the whole story from Titus
fields.Description: Hardie and the boys know the whole story. It'll be difficult to get it out of him. Have you thoroughly inspected the body? Looked around for a witness? Gotten friendly with the Union boss and the company rep? *Really* gotten to Klaasje?
fields.subtask_title_01: Convince Hardie boys to tell you the whole story.
fields.subtask_title_02: Confront Klaasje with the Hardies' story.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / TITUS ALAIN AND EUGENE
fields.Description: Dialogue with Hardie and the surviving boys

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / EUGENE AND ALAIN
fields.Description: A dialogue with Eugene and Alain after Titus got killed in the Tribunal

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / EUGENE barks post tribunal
fields.Description: barks for Eugene as Titus did not get shot

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / Alain barks post tribunal
fields.Description: barks of Alain as Titus did not get shot

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / Alain 2 barks post tribunal
fields.Description: barks for Alain if Titus got shit in tribunal

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / MAN WITH SUNGLASSES ESPRIT RC
fields.Description: ESPRIT RED CHECK

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / vicquemare esprit afterthought
fields.Description: What a hell... *are* we from the same station?

fields.Title: VILLAGE / POSSE
fields.Description:
It's time to face your colleagues. 

This is the dialogue that autostarts once you step to the villlage square, the others just bark and stand there.

fields.Title: Extract a confession from the Deserter
fields.Description: You need at least three examples of proof to show that you have him anyway. There is little point in his resistance.

fields.Title: COAST / WOMENS RIGHTS second stage barks
fields.Description: Barks for WR protester post-mercenary tribunal. The Women's Rights protester is drunk, lying in the sand. He uses the tare drunk/working class drunk idle animation.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / protester logic reaction
fields.Description: Seems that after the strike the women's rights activist has radicalised and... gotten sloshed.
fields.Placement:
Area: around the very drunk protester, lying in the sand (whenever art/scene for this actually appears) 
Details:

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / tome comment
fields.Description: Everyone knows the most interesting thing about fascists was their magic.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / EXIT DOOR
fields.Description: this is a crazy-ass exit-from-whirling door, god dammit.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / TAPE PLAYER
fields.Condition: Variable["TASK.listen_to_merc_tape"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.listen_to_merc_tape_done"] == false  and  CheckItem("boombox") == false
fields.Description: You can click on tape player -- it has broken down while you were gone. Can't listen to any tapes now, best you find a new one from Roy.

fields.Title: JAM / TOMMY barks
fields.Description: tommy barks after jam mystery done

fields.Title: EVRART ORB / nighttime desk logic
fields.Description: A smart man doesn't leave any incriminating documents behind.

fields.Title: EVRART / COFFEE TABLE
fields.Condition: IsHourBetween(22, 7)  and  CheckItem("union_membership_card_other") == false  and  CheckItem("union_membership_card") == false
fields.Description: a quick table interaction where you find a different key card to get out of the harbour at night.

fields.Title: EVRART ORB / coffee table reaction
fields.Description: Look -- something forgotten on the coffee table.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / SMALLEST CHURCH TAPE
fields.Description: tape interactable in inventory; smallest church in saint-saens with all the dialogue necessary. item pickup in world.

fields.Title: WALKWAY ORB / equipping carabineer jacket
fields.Description: putting jacket on +1 to revacholian nationhood you fascist man

fields.Title: Flow – PLAZA ORB / wearing skullboy jackets
fields.Description: This what happens when you put either of their jackets on, ya cool cad!

fields.Title: LAIR ORB / wearing revolutionary hat
fields.Description: Putting the hat on gives a one time +1 to Mazovian Socio-Economics, you communist failure.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / wearing interisolary pants
fields.Description: Putting the pants on gives a one time +1 to Kingdom of Conscience, you moralist douche. This is edited now.

fields.Title: APT ORB / wearing fancy loafers
fields.Description: Putting the shoes on gives a one time +1 to Indirect Modes of Taxation, you capitalist swine.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK ORB / wielding your gun
