fields.Title: INVENTORY / PRIMER
fields.Description: Primerbook interaction!

fields.Title: INVENTORY / GIANT HAM SANDWICH
fields.Description: Eating Gaston's ham-sandwich.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / KLAASJE PASSPORT
fields.Description: This is the inventory interaction folder for the readable item: Klaasje's Passport!

fields.Title: INVENTORY / DELUXE TOPPING PIE
fields.Description: That some good pie to eat and get healthy.

fields.Title: VILLAGE ORB / illegible street sign
fields.Description: The street sign is illegible below the graffito.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / inland warns about lorryman
fields.Description: This guy looks like trouble. Better ignore him for now.
fields.Placement: around the Racist Lorry Driver, when you're nearing him.

fields.Title: INITIATION / cannot pay game over
fields.Description: orbital that pops up if you, the player, try to BREAK the system by spending *all* of the money you can get *anywhere* in Martinaise so you cannot pay Garte for the room at all. oh, believe me, we will take this into account and you will get a game over.

fields.Title: Take stuffed bird to Garte
fields.Description: Garte was fixing a stuffed bird. You've found another stuffed bird, not the same bird but not broken either. Take it to him in the Whirling-in-Rags. Perhaps he can hang it up on the wall.

fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / messy room after lely tape
fields.Condition: Variable["whirling.orb_kim_empathy_warcorridor_done"] == false  and  Variable["whirling.orb_kim_room_mess_trigger"] == true  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["TASK.report_to_the_tribunal_done"] == false  and  IsHourBetween(8, 20)
fields.Description: Kim's reaction to the mess in your room after you've listened to tape and he was present etc.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / PHOTO OF TATTOOS
fields.Description: instant photo of the hanged man's tattoos by Kim Kitsuragi

fields.Title: KIM SWITCH / TRIED SHOOTING YOURSELF
fields.Description: a quick switch if you tried to shoot yourself with an empty gun

fields.Title: BOARDWALK ORB / arno van eyck 1
fields.Description: The faded remains of a poster with the date '46. A name is faintly legible: "Arn... v ...ck."

fields.Title: COAST ORB / arno van eyck 2
fields.Condition: Variable["coast.orb_van_eyck_heard_beat"] == true  and  Variable["coast.orb_van_eyck_saw_graffito"] == true  and  Variable["coast.orb_van_eyck_smell"] == true
fields.Description: A cluster of polychromatic flyers blow by in the breeze.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / arno van eyck 3
fields.Description: A faint smell of soldering, melted insulation --  nylon and ozone.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / arno van eyck after
fields.Description: Afterthought reaction orbital to those flyers, man. Do it. Talk to your stupid brain.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / arno van eyck 4

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / arno van eyck 5

fields.Title: PIER ORB / arno van eyck 6

fields.Title: GATES ORB / arno van eyck 7

fields.Title: PIER ORB / arno van eyck react
fields.Description: Sounds like an obscure live performance in a dirty underground bunker.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / arno van eyck 8
fields.Description: Below the grime a dark-neon poster reads "Van Eyck TOTALLY TRANCENDENT."

fields.Title: LAIR / EXIT DOOR
fields.Description: Door interactable, open the door, let Kim in. Kim possibly hidden behind fog of war.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / mullen mistaken identity conclusion

fields.Placement:
Area: on plaza near annette, or the thought bubble area should be wide enough to cover both the entrance of the bookstore and the side exit/entrance to the doomed cellar.
Details:

fields.Title: Offer figurines to Dolores Dei
fields.Description: Dolores Dei was fond of figurines. She deserves more. You should offer her any and all you have one day, if you meet her in person. What an odd task to give yourself -- but here we are.

fields.Title: CANAL / WATERLOCK LEVER
fields.Description: this is the button-switch-lever-thing that closes the waterlock once it's been fixed on day 3

fields.Title: CANAL ORB / faln at night
fields.Condition: Variable["village.idiot_kim_present_end_of_headless"] == true  and  IsKimHere()  and  IsHourBetween(24, 1)  and  Variable["coast.orb_faln_rider_at_night_done"] == false
fields.Description: idiot doom spiral story reaction orb -- the faln rider (not) appearing at the canal at night.

fields.Title: LEDGER WAKEUP
fields.Description: Woke up, bro.

fields.Title: COAL ORB / labourer jeans equipped
fields.Description: putting on the labourer pants make orb appear, similar to your own pants at beginning of game; in order to find gum wrapper in pocket

fields.Title: INVENTORY / GUM WRAPPER
fields.Description: the chewing gum wrapper you can interact with whether you've messed with the ledger or not

fields.Title: Find the murder weapon
fields.Description: You need to find the firearm that killed the hanged man. Something tells you it will take *some* time. You could start by identifying the bullet, so you'd know the weapon that shot it. After that, keep your eyes open. And be patient.
fields.subtask_title_01: Perform a ballistics analysis on the bullet.
fields.subtask_title_02: Perform an advanced analysis, using H/E Coordination.
fields.subtask_title_03: Locate a *working* firearm that shoots 4.46 ammo.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / REMOTE VIEWER
fields.Description: Inland Empire -- Happens on a counter now.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / SUICIDE COP
fields.Description: For when the thought is FIXED. Logic tries to get you to kill yourself if you have a gun and bullets, and tells you you're stupid if you don't.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / WHAT LIES BENEATH
fields.Description: Broke into Cuno's parents' room and communist apartment and Gary's apartment and church – counter. Global thought after 2.

fields.Title: THOUGHT / SOBRIETY DAY ONE
fields.Condition: Variable["character.sobriety_one_done"] == false  and  DayCount() == 3  and  SubstanceUsedOnce("alcohol") == false  and  SubstanceUsedOnce("speed") == false  and  SubstanceUsedOnce("pyrholidon") == false
fields.Description: Endurance -- about staying clean. Not an initiation dialogue, but UPON FIXING thought?

fields.Title: YARD ORB / door later
fields.Description: Your hear the sound of running water. Someone's washing dishes.

fields.Title: COAST / SMALL BUOY

fields.Title: COAST ORB / reeds with buoy
fields.Condition: Variable["TASK.inspect_the_buoy"] == false  and  Variable["coast.reeds_buoy_mainhub_reached"] == false  and  Variable["coast.orb_buoy_done"] == false
fields.Description: Visual Calculus notes that this is a good place to hide things.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / blood on the sand
fields.Description: Blood drips from your knuckles to the sand: drip, drip, drip...
fields.Placement: In the sand in front of payphone on coast

fields.Title: CHURCH ORB / figurine
fields.Condition: Variable["church.stained_figurine_task"]  and  (CheckItem("figurine_set_headless_faln_rider")  or  CheckItem("figurine_set_revolutionary"))  and  Variable["church.orb_figurine_thought_done"] == false
fields.Description: this pops up and tells you you should give dolores dei your figurine
fields.Placement: in the church, around the stained glass window (is an afterthought for that dialogue)=

fields.Title: SEAFORT DREAM ORB / door is back kim

fields.Placement: dream seafort island map , flak tower, a little way west from spring mattress. This is supposed to fire the moment you're up from dream and have walked one step.

fields.Title: SEAFORT DREAM ORB / door is back cuno

fields.Placement: dream seafort island map , flak tower, a little way west from spring mattress. This is supposed to fire the moment you're up from dream and have walked one step.

fields.Title: SEAFORT DREAM ORB / door is back solo

fields.Placement: dream seafort island map , flak tower, a little way west from spring mattress. This is supposed to fire the moment you're up from dream and have walked one step.

fields.Title: SEAFORT / DESERTER MURDER
fields.Description:
Getting him to admit to it by piling on evidence.

DRAMA (INT) red check

fields.Title: Report the dead body to the station
fields.Description: Another dead body, this time on the Martinaise boardwalk on the coast. You don't have time to look into it. Someone at the lieutenant's station can handle it. Call and let them know what you found -- after you've examined the body for clues.
fields.subtask_title_01: Examine the library card you found on the dead body.
fields.subtask_title_02: Call the station to hand over the case.

fields.Title: Dead body on the boardwalk
fields.Description: Another dead body, this time on the Martinaise boardwalk on the coast. Search the man's remains and follow the leads to see if you can verify his identity.
fields.subtask_title_01: Examine the library card you found on the dead man.
fields.subtask_title_02: Call Jamrock Public Library for information on the library card's owner.
fields.subtask_title_03: Call the station about the dead body.
fields.subtask_title_04: Go to Billie Méjean's apartment to deliver the bad news. It's in the apartment buildings in north Martinaise, apt #20.

fields.Title: INVENTORY / LIBRARY CARD
fields.Description: dead working class husband library card

fields.Title: KINEEMA / REPORTING THE CORPSE ON THE BOARDWALK

fields.Title: BOARDWALK ORB / dangerous boardwalk

fields.Title: BOARDWALK / TRASH CAN

Extra open threads

Arrest him finally

fields.Title: Ask gardener about gardening in March
fields.Description: The young woman with the wheelbarrow at the corner of the Whirling-in-Rags told you that she had to take a break from gardening because of the cadaver smell. But what if she was lying? After all, what kind of *gardening* is done in *March*?

fields.subtask_title_01: Return to the Hardie boys with more evidence. Try talking to their boss or examining either the tracks on the crime scene or the belt around the victim's neck.

fields.Title: OFFICE / PUNCHCLOCK AND PHONE
fields.Description: For ten cents you can attempt an interfacing WC and call to a video rental you used to rent films from.

fields.Placement: in front of the kineema on the plaza floor AND if possible also village (if kineema is there)

fields.Title: Rest in the flak tower
fields.Description: Your damaged physique has earned its rest, no matter what thoughts and dreams it may bring.

fields.Title: Ask Kim about Seolite database
fields.Description: According to Gary, Seolites are using advanced technology to spy on people all around the world. Maybe you should ask Kim if he can get you information about yourself from the Seolite database.

fields.Title: The doomed hostel?
fields.Description: The question yet to be *totally* answered -- is Whirling-in-Rags a part of the Doomed Commercial Area? Talk to Garte about this, see what he thinks.

fields.Title: Inform Dicemaker about the Source of Doom
fields.Description: Soona's research has led you to discover a 2 mm origin point of pale in the Dolorian Church of Humanity down the coast. This might be negatively affecting the entire neighbourhood, including the Doomed Commercial Area where Dicemaker works. Tell her about it.

fields.Title: Inform Plaisance about the Source of Doom
fields.Description: Soona's research has led you to discover a 2 mm origin point of pale in the Dolorian Church of Humanity down the coast. This might be negatively affecting the entire neighbourhood, including the Doomed Commercial Area where Plaisance works. Tell her about it.

fields.Title: GAME OVER!
fields.Description: This is the folder where all of those NewspaperEndgame Game Over nodes live and procreate!

fields.Title: Open the blast door
fields.Description: The large blast door blocks your path forward. You have to get it open. Maybe from the console? If there's a button...
fields.subtask_title_01: Find fuel for the generator and get it running.

fields.Title: Find Idiot Doom Spiral's jacket
fields.Description: Idiot Doom Spiral stole a cool jacket at one point... and then lost it again. The story of his life. According to the man, the jacket was last seen somewhere around the boardwalk, maybe at the abandoned fish market?
fields.subtask_title_01: Wash the dirty jacket.

fields.Title: APT ORB / critical theory books
fields.Description: Books of 'critical theory' on the monstrosities of capital, and such.

fields.Title: BOARDWALK ORB / slit windows outside
fields.Description: You can't see anything but the depths of the darkness behind these slits...

fields.Title: Find one armour piece
fields.Description: You really just want one piece of the armour... it's enough. Find and locate one piece and this one's done.

fields.Title: Find all armour pieces
fields.Description: You want all of the armour pieces. Deck yourself out in full metal battle-hardened glory. NOTE! This might take a while. Like, a *long* while.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / roachthought
fields.Description: Only a dog and no more.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / phasmidthought
fields.Description: Up there? The phasmid, perhaps? No... you know it's but a dog.

fields.Title: PIER ORB / yachtthought
fields.Description: This is worth more than you'll ever earn in all your life.

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / gardenhose
fields.Description: A garden hose. This won't be of use until the snow melts.

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / emptyarch
fields.Description: Chairs and tables eaten by rain and rot.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / beneaththestreetthought
fields.Description: A sewer grate: a gateway to the river of filth.

fields.Title: GATES ORB / portlogothought
fields.Description: The Greater Revachol Industrial Harbour.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / seconddetectivethought
fields.Description: You shouldn't feel threatened by handsome men. Don't be silly.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / newmagazine
fields.Description: JUMP JAMS! -- A populaire Musique Mag.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / largecab
fields.Description: Empty, but for cigarette ash and the crumbs of fried foods.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / stas-rajko
fields.Description: You can examine and appreciate this car with Kim.

fields.Title: PIER ORB / insideofagarage
fields.Description: Inside, the frame of a motorcycle-in-repair and the tools used to disassemble it.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / pagetwothought

fields.Description: A conversation with EletroChem that encourages you to commit an act of public indecency for Superstar point

fields.Title: JAM ORB / sliverofthenewspaperongrate
fields.Description: Scribbled between the thighs of a page-three girl: *L’ORIGINE DU DISCO*

fields.Title: COAST ORB / roadsidethought
fields.Description: Dialogue that comes up as the player walks along the street. Fantasy of the other side of the pavement.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / lightingrig
fields.Description: A composite eye of halogen lights watches you, emitting a low buzz.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / panel
fields.Description: A panel that controls the cranes reads "Éteindre," "Allumer."

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / cranepart
fields.Description: This speaker tower is silent. There is no work to organize in the yard below.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / industrythought
fields.Description: The shipyard ahead is oddly quiet. The great machines are sleeping.

fields.Title: CONTAINERYARD ORB / harbourthought
fields.Description: The musk of oil and rust comes from the chasm in front of you. Smells like blood.

fields.Title: APT ORB / corkboard
fields.Description: Eviction notices and missing pets are plastered on top of each other.

fields.Title: APT ORB / killtherich
fields.Description: The graffito says: "A firing squad for the rich."

fields.Title: APT ORB / stink
fields.Description: The air stinks with something sour...

fields.Title: APT ORB / aptbed
fields.Description: Looks like a fine mattress.

fields.Title: APT ORB / aptbedplasmidthought
fields.Description: Could it be *the phasmid*? No… Probably not.

fields.Title: APT ORB / aptbedbugs
fields.Description: Don't be ridiculous. You can hear it swarming with bugs.

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / cactus
fields.Description: Someone's growing rosemary, thyme -- and a cactus.

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / cigarettestash
fields.Description: The breaker box is full of cigarette butts and electric wires.

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / balconydoornumber
fields.Description: This is the door to apartment #29.

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / windowcurtains
fields.Description: The curtains shift. Just a little. Someone is watching from within.

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / anotherbalconydoornumberthought
fields.Description: Voices from within. Singing along to some buoyant dance track.

fields.Title: BACKYARD ORB / anotherbalconydoornumber
fields.Description: This is the door to apartment #30.

fields.Title: PIER ORB / searails
fields.Description: This is an afterthought dialogue with VisCalc.

fields.Title: PIER ORB / tarp
fields.Description: Above, tarps flap in the wind. Forgotten hammers and nails rust.

fields.Title: PIER ORB / lockrusted
fields.Description: The door is locked. You can't get in.

fields.Title: PIER ORB / lockrustedthought
fields.Description: The chair's new. Someone lives back here.

fields.Title: COAL ORB / bed
fields.Description: Someone's been sleeping here -- recently.

fields.Title: COAL ORB / bedthought
fields.Description: Cindy?

fields.Title: COAL ORB / otherbedthought
fields.Description: The girl outside?

fields.Title: COAL ORB / coalpile
fields.Description: Enough coal to last for several winters. Smells of chemicals.

fields.Title: COAL ORB / shaft
fields.Description: A hundred tiny feet scurrying beneath the grate. The rats of the city.

fields.Title: COAL ORB / drugbox
fields.Description: Fire! Suddenly you feel the box is on *fire*... why?

fields.Title: COAST ORB / junkmusic
fields.Description: Someone has left their music collection beneath the tarpaulin.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / fencehole
fields.Description: Someone has broken down the fence *and* the barbed wire.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / coveredboat
fields.Description: There's a boat tucked away underneath the tarpaulin cover.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / jamtrafficthought
fields.Description: Traffic beyond the gate. More abandoned motor lorries.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / icesound
fields.Description: The ice just off the coast crackles, shifting.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / windowtoinside
fields.Description: Through the broken glass: dusty shelves and a forgotten chair.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / washingboardthought
fields.Description: Sounds of life in the north. A washboard scrubs filth from fabric.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / floatboat
fields.Description: This boat is floating freely in the water, unmoored.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / partydrugs
fields.Description: Cinderblocks, charred. A makeshift firepit with magazines for lighting.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / reflectingwater
fields.Description: Looking back at you from the rust coloured water: you.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / reflectingwaterthought
fields.Description: CONVO: Dead industry polluted the waters. Though the boom is long forgotten, the damage continues.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / rustbarrel
fields.Description: Rust-eaten letters read: "MAZUT."

fields.Title: COAST ORB / signtext
fields.Description: The sign says: 'Entrée interdite.'

fields.Title: COAST ORB / boathideout
fields.Description: The boathouse is shoddily constructed. A strong breeze might blow it over.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / runningwater
fields.Description: The water runs from the west. The source is upstream. A broken pipe?

fields.Title: COAST ORB / fishpost
fields.Description: A school of fish huddle around the fence post. Then scatter into the dark.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / bunkerthought
fields.Condition: Variable["coast.orb_bunker_unlock"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.ask_about_ruby_in_village"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.locate_ruby_on_the_coast_done"] == false  and  Variable["coast.sense_bunker_viscal_done"] == false  and  Variable["village.flashlight_reveal_doomed_cache"] == false
fields.Description: Maybe a way underground? Maybe she’s down there?

fields.Title: COAST ORB / postinsnow
fields.Description: Full of holes. Could the posts hide... treasure? Look inside.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / hideoutboat
fields.Description: Could the Instigator be hiding in the boathouse? No… that’d be too easy.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / bunker
fields.Description: There's a slit in the concrete here... a sewer?

fields.Title: COAST ORB / feldwindows
fields.Condition: Variable["coast.orb_feldwindows_done"] == false  and  Variable["coast.orb_feld_giant_window"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.climb_ladder_done"] == false
fields.Description: A conversation with SF about the inside of the building and hiding.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / dockhomethought
fields.Description: That tarp will keep out neither rain, nor snow, nor wind.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / dockhome
fields.Description: A makeshift roof. Vagrants have tried to make the boardwalk habitable.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / weighmachine
fields.Description: A coin operated weighing machine. Hasn't been used for a decade.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / firstfrontwindow
fields.Description: Dusty pews in the shadows. Many seem to be missing.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / secondfrontwindow
fields.Description: An altar shrouded in dark. Or something like that – it’s too dark to tell.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / firststack
fields.Description: It must have taken a lot of patience to do this.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / churchladder
fields.Description: From up there, one would have a great view of the ice floes out back.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / secondstack
fields.Description: Yellow moss on these stones... They're probably stolen from someone's garden.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / firstcheerypost
fields.Description: Painted with pastels. Someone is trying to bring cheer into the world.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / winchbarrel
fields.Description: This barrel has been recently discarded. It still smells of fuel oil.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / phone
fields.Description: A dead phone. A smashed receiver; like someone hung up too hard.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / electricthought
fields.Description: Buzz. Hum. The electricity flows through the wires with audible power.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / redwindow
fields.Description: White curtains have been drawn shut. No looking in.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / collapsedbridge
fields.Description: The beams are splintered. The bridge didn't collapse on its own. Artillery broke it.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / bluedoor
fields.Description: A door. A building. A hiding place. Could the Instigator be inside?!

fields.Title: COAST ORB / bluedoororb
fields.Description: Conversation with PhysInt.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / forgottenbuild
fields.Description: Construction material. Whoever planned to build this house left in a hurry.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / floatice
fields.Description: The ice bobs up and down, creaking as it rubs against adjacent ice.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / seagull
fields.Description: There is a seagull flying somewhere along the coast. The area there should have an afterthought orbital.

fields.Title: JAM ORB / foreigncar
fields.Description: A foreign car. Kept in good condition.

fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / plazatilecoat
fields.Description: This Shivers initiates the coat quest. It is an Easy check.

fields.Title: BOOKSTORE ORB / bookstorerug
fields.Description: Second Shivers in the coat quest. Points you to the Harbour. Normal diff.

fields.Title: WALKWAY ORB / walkwaycoat
fields.Description: This is the third Shivers in the coat quest. It is a challenging orb.

fields.Title: APT ORB / rugcoat
fields.Description: This is the fifth Shivers in the coat quest. It is Very Difficult.

fields.Title: COAST ORB / blockade
fields.Description: These heavy military blockades are riddled with bullet holes, crumbling.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / tyreisland
fields.Description: To protect boats coming in? But who comes here anymore...

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / blastedrock
fields.Description: It must have been a direct hit to take out such a huge chunk.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / plankbridge
fields.Description: A makeshift bridge. The bombs were powerful enough to break the foundation.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / missingrails
fields.Description: No guard rails... you look down. This is a safety hazard.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / concreteslabs
fields.Description: Old building material. Left behind.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / dangersign
fields.Description: *ATTENTION - INFLAMMABLE!*

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / chemstink
fields.Description: There's a lingering trace of mazut in the air.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / inlandentering
fields.Description: This is it.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / destroyedstairs
fields.Description: No way to get up there. The stairs are gone

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / insidetheruinpeek
fields.Description: The inside of the fortress... You make out the console and the blast door.

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / turningwheel
fields.Description: When the wheel moves, the massive machine must move with it.

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / kitchen
fields.Description: Dishes stained with sauce and fire. A survivor's kitchen.

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / chairbook
fields.Description: A waterlogged book. The pages are drying, but it'll be illegible forever now.

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / telescopetower
fields.Description: A specialized telescope. Helps mark the distance to faraway targets.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / concretestrip
fields.Description: A huge killing structure.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / amongthereeds
fields.Description: The reeds sway strangely... No, it's nothing.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / approachinghouse
fields.Description: The house stands -- barely.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / killingpoint
fields.Description: The pain in your pelvis makes you wince. Then you continue.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / waveswashhere
fields.Description: The ice cracks under your feet. Be careful not to fall through...

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / bleuetsviscalc
fields.Description: Small bell-shaped flowers are blossoming in the sand. The snow must be weaker.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / bleuetsendurance
fields.Description: Flowers growing out of the sand, from under the snow. Winter's over soon!

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / bleuetsinland
fields.Description: There are flowers here already in bloom. Winter will be over soon.

fields.Title: SEAFORT ORB / bleuetsperceptionsmell
fields.Description: The air smells sweet. And scary, somehow.
fields.Placement: around the white flowers in the seafort 3rd sector, before seeing desereter (this si an afterthoyght for SEAFORT ORB / bleuets)

fields.Title: SEAFORT INT ORB / smellofsea
fields.Description: The smell of the sea fills the air.

fields.Title: Question Klaasje about the tape
fields.Description: You refused the tape Hardie offered you, wherein the hanged man supposedly testified his intent to rape and pillage. Does Klaasje know anything about the recording? You should ask her -- unless you like loose ends.

fields.Title: APT ORB / half light snoring
fields.Description: The snoring is... scary somehow. You should leave.

fields.Title: Investigate apartment #10 for the cleaning lady
fields.Description: The cleaning lady said the apartment should be empty, but there's definitely someone inside. Could it be *counterculture people*? Investigate and report back to the cleaning lady in the apartment building's hallway.
fields.subtask_title_01: Report back to cleaning lady.

fields.Title: APT ORB / soup
fields.Description: Some leftovers kept warm on a stove top.

fields.Title: APT ORB / fake plants
fields.Description: Fake house plants made of plastic.

fields.Title: APT ORB / kitchen smell
fields.Description: Smells like buckwheat and onions here.

fields.Title: APT ORB / windows
fields.Description: Windows covered in old newspaper clippings.

fields.Title: APT ORB / windows logic
fields.Description: Can't they afford curtains?

fields.Title: APT ORB / biology textbook
fields.Description: A textbook for high school. Mathematics. Trigonometry mostly.

fields.Title: APT ORB / posters
fields.Description: Posters of contemporary pop stars adorn the walls.

fields.Title: APT ORB / books
fields.Description: Someone here is an avid reader of science fiction.

fields.Title: APT ORB / hum aid
fields.Description: Packages of humanitarian aid macaronis.

fields.Title: APT ORB / red astra
fields.Description: An empty pack of Red Astra cigarettes hidden under the bed.

fields.Title: Read the watermarks
fields.Description: Get in front of Kineema's headlights to read the halogen watermarks in your ledger. This may yield some information about who you are.
fields.subtask_title_01: First go to the Kineema and turn on the lights.
fields.subtask_title_02: Now go stand in front of the Kineema, in the lights.
fields.subtask_title_03: Delete this task later, it's only for testing.

fields.Title: Fridge victim's body
fields.Description: You need to buy yourself more time to find whatever you're missing in the corpse. A fridge would allow you to preserve the body longer. Ask the Whirling, Frittte, or maybe Cuno, or some other local kids?
fields.subtask_title_01: Ask around about fridge.
fields.subtask_title_02: Check out the fridge in the commercial building across from the Whirling.
fields.subtask_title_03: Plug in the ice bear fridge.
fields.subtask_title_04: Get Kim to help you move the body.

fields.Title: Find Morell, the Cryptozoologist
fields.Description: The ageing cryptozoologist has been out in the reeds for too long, and his wife, Lena, is very worried. Maybe you can find him when you happen to be on the coast?
fields.subtask_title_01: Lena wants to know what happened to Morell. He set off south-west, across the canal. Start by going there.
fields.subtask_title_02: Tell Lena Morell is missing because of the broken water lock.
fields.subtask_title_03: You told Lena Morell is missing because of the broken waterlock. She is still worried he hasn't come back -- let Morell know if you see him.

fields.Title: Determine where the shot came from
fields.Description: Where could the shot that killed the hanged man have come from -- if not from the roof? This will take some checking out of locations.
fields.subtask_title_01: Get a map (from the bookstore?) and use it on Klaasje's window.
fields.subtask_title_02: Check Land's End for bullet traces.
fields.subtask_title_03: Check boardwalk for bullet traces.
fields.subtask_title_04: Check island for bullet traces.

fields.Title: Split a 'kilo' with Cuno
fields.Description: Enter flat #12 in the Capeside apartment building and get Cuno's speed. Sharing it with him will cement your friendship. And who knows what secrets it will lead to?
fields.subtask_title_01: Get speed from Cuno's apartment.
fields.subtask_title_02: Take down Cuno's dad (optional).
fields.subtask_title_03: Report back to Cuno.
fields.subtask_title_04: Find Cuno a new kilo.
fields.subtask_title_05: Try opening the door to Cuno's apartment again.

fields.Title: Help Soona with her project
fields.Description: Soona will cooperate with the ravers' nightclub plan... if you help her out with the research project first. Find the filament memory with an off-site copy from her old workplace and bring it back to her, then wait for further instructions. If you run into any problems you can always ask for Soona's help.
fields.subtask_title_01: Find the giant ice bear fridge in Doomed Commercial Area.
fields.subtask_title_02: Find the frozen ice cream maker mentioned in the note.
fields.subtask_title_03: Get the ice cream maker open (find the right tool or ask Soona for help).
fields.subtask_title_04: Bring the off-site copy back to Soona.
fields.subtask_title_05: Move the water bowls to the right position and report back.
fields.subtask_title_06: Figure out why Soona couldn't hear anything through her headphones.
fields.subtask_title_07: Check up on Soona's project after ravers have moved in.
fields.subtask_title_08: Talk to Egg Head about the AUX cable.
fields.subtask_title_09: Report back to Soona that she can unmute the speakers.

fields.Title: Make van Eyck's jam harder core
fields.Description: You can feel it -- this music could hit so much harder. It just needs a few tweaks... Walk back to the canal and see if you can find any tapes that could work as a melody, then bring them back to Egg Head for remixing.
fields.subtask_title_01: Find a tape with a melody for Egg Head.
fields.subtask_title_02: Repair the broken bundle of magnetic tape.
fields.subtask_title_03: Help Egg Head with the beat (this may take a while).

fields.Title: Getting the Hanged Man's boots
fields.Description: In order to succeed 1) the body has to be down, 2) autopsy has to be finished, 3) and Kim has to be absent (he wouldn't approve). This will be *devilishly* tricky, so don't beat yourself up if you manage to send the body to the processing without getting hold of the boots.
fields.subtask_title_01: Get boots off victim's feet.
fields.subtask_title_02: Wash the boots -- in a kitchen somewhere.

fields.Title: The smoker on the balcony
fields.Description: You met a mysterious stranger smoking on the balcony of the apartment building north of Martinaise. He knows something about the murder. Find out where he lives and question him again.
fields.subtask_title_01: Find a way inside the large apartment building in the north.
fields.subtask_title_02: Ask around for his apartment number.
fields.subtask_title_03: Locate the door #28 in the apt building.
fields.subtask_title_04: Visit apartment #28 some time after 21:00 to see if anyone's home.

fields.Title: Extract a motive
fields.Description: Why did he do this thing? Why???

fields.Title: Confront the Pigs and get your gun back
fields.Description: Someone's been running around with your sidearm pretending to be a police officer. You must meet her near the old fish market at 22:00 and get your service weapon back. Just walk past the fishing village until you see the boardwalk.

fields.Title: Track down your gun
fields.Description: Someone must know something about your lost firearm. Maybe a district authority, like someone high up in the Union? Or someone local, who saw you with it before you passed out -- the Whirling's absent bartender? You could also ask the local pawnshop.
fields.subtask_title_01: Find any information you can on the gun.
fields.subtask_title_02: Keep looking. Maybe someone else knows something.

fields.Title: Address Gaston's cheating in the pétanque game
fields.Description: Something looked off about the game the old men are playing on the plaza -- one of them (Gaston?) was cheating. Cheating in sports in unacceptable. Address this!

fields.Title: Get topping pie from Gary
fields.Description: It's waiting for you -- wheat-free, vegan deliciousness. Gary said he can give it to you once he's in the Whirling.

fields.Title: LAIR / FLASHLIGHT
fields.Condition: CheckItem("flashlight")  and  CheckEquipped("flashlight") == false  and  Variable["boardwalk.flashlight_reaction_orb"] == false
